anya-e1205n0:7_0: Tattha tikkhattumagamā nātho’ti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe parināmetvā appatisaraṇabhāvappattānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhanipphādanabhāvena
anya-e1205n0:7_1: nātho patisaraṇa bhūto bhagavā buddhadhammasaṅgharatanattayamaggaṃ ācikkhanto laṅkādīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:7_2: Tattha paṭhamagamane tāva bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha puratthīmābhimukho nisīditvā sūriye anatthamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā,
anya-e1205n0:7_3: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme cutupapātañāṇaṃ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne paccayākāre
anya-e1205n0:7_4: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā dasabalacatuvesārajjādi guṇapatimaṇḍitaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā bodhimaṇḍappadese
anya-e1205n0:7_5: anukkamena sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinno dhammagambhirataṃ paccavekkhanena
anya-e1205n0:7_6: appossukkataṃ āpajjamāno dasasahassa brahmaparivārena sahampatimahābrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano hutvā
anya-e1205n0:7_7: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ bahūpakārakaṃ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsīnaṃ
anya-e1205n0:7_8: puraṃ gantvā aññākoṇaḍaññappamukhe aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amataṃ pāyento dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pakkhassa
anya-e1205n0:7_9: pañcamiyaṃ pañcavaggiye sabbepi te arahante patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ divasameva yasakulaputtassa rattibhāge
anya-e1205n0:7_10: sotāpattiphalaṃ datvā punadivase arahantaṃ datvā tassa sahāyake catupaññāsajane arahantaṃ pāpetvā evaṃ
anya-e1205n0:7_11: loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu vutthavasso pavāretvā,
anya-e1205n0:7_12: ‘caratha bhikkhave cārika’ nti bhikkhu disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
anya-e1205n0:7_13: bhaddavaggiye kumāre tiṃsajane vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
anya-e1205n0:7_14: dassento uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinento tattheva vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:7_17: “Sacāyaṃ mahāsamaṇo imassa samāgamassa majjhe pāṭihāriyaṃ kareyya lābhasakkāro me parihāyissati”ti.
anya-e1205n0:7_18: Tassevaṃ pavattaajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā pātova uttarakuruto bhikkhaṃ āharitvā anotatte āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā
anya-e1205n0:8_0: Tassa pana dīpassa mahāgaṅgāya dakkhiṇapasse āyāmato tiyojane puthulato ekayojanappamāṇe mahānāgavanuyyāne
anya-e1205n0:8_1: yakkhasamāgamassa majjhe tassa upari mahiyaṅgaṇathūpassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne ākāseyeva ṭhīto vuṭṭhivātandhakāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:8_3: Te bhayena upaddutā “kassa nu kho imaṃ kamma”nti ito cito olokento addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ ākāse nisinnaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:9_0: “Sace tumhe abhayaṃ icchatha mayhaṃ nisajjaṭṭhānassa okāsaṃ dethā”ti.
anya-e1205n0:9_2: Bhagavā nisajjāya okāsaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ bhayaṃ vinodetvā tehi dinne bhumibhāge cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:9_4: Te yakkhā bhītatasitā aññattha gantuṃ asahamānā samantato sāgaratīre rāsibhūtā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:9_6: Tesu tattha patiṭṭhitesu puna yathāṭṭhāneva ṭhapetvā pattharitacammakhaṇḍampi saṃkhipi.
anya-e1205n0:9_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tato tato devā sannipatiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:9_10: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā asaṅkheyyā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:9_11: Sumanakūṭe pana mahāsumanadevo sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā attano pūjanīyaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāci.
anya-e1205n0:9_12: Bhagavā tena yācito sīsaṃ pāṇinā parāmasitvā kesadhātuṃgahetvā tassa adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:9_13: Datvā ca pana laṅkādīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā parittaṃ katvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya puna uruvelameva āgato.
anya-e1205n0:9_14: So pana kesadhātuyo suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakenādāya satthu nisinnaṭṭhāne nānāratanehi vicittaṃ thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:9_15: upari indanīlamaṇithūpikāhi pidahitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjento vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:9_16: Parinibbute pana bhagavati sāriputtassa antevāsiko sarabhū nāma thero khīṇāsavo citakato iddhiyā tathāgatassa
anya-e1205n0:9_17: gīvaṭṭhiṃ ādāya tasmiṃ indanīlamaṇithūpe patiṭṭhāpetvā meghavaṇṇapāsāṇehi dvādasahatthaṃ thūpaṃ kārāpetvā gato.
anya-e1205n0:9_18: Tato devānampiyatissarañño bhātā cūḷābhayo nāma kumāro tamabbhutaṃ cetiyaṃ disvā abhippasanno taṃ paṭicchādento tiṃsahatthaṃ cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:9_19: Puna duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayamahārājā taṃ paṭicchādetvā asītihatthaṃ kañcukacetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:9_20: Mahiyaṅgaṇa thūpassa patiṭṭhānādhikāro evaṃ vitthārato veditabbo?
anya-e1205n0:12_0: Tato pubbuttare ṭhatvā pallaṅkā īsake jino
anya-e1205n0:15_0: Vicinitvā jino dhammaṃ varaṃ so ratanāghare.
anya-e1205n0:20_0: Catuhi lokapālehi silāpattaṃ samāhaṭaṃ catukkamekakaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhānena nāyako.
anya-e1205n0:22_0: Tahiṃ pana gahetvāna bhattakiccaṃ akā jino.
anya-e1205n0:24_0: Saraṇaṃ agamuṃ te taṃ satthu dinnasiroruhā.
anya-e1205n0:25_0: Gantvāna te sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ thūpaṃ katvā manoramaṃ
anya-e1205n0:33_0: Patto pāṭipade vappo bhaddiyo dutiye phalaṃ,
anya-e1205n0:34_0: Tatiye ca mahānāmo assajī ca catutthīyaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:41_0: Taṃ taṃ damī jino nāgaṃ damanena urādigaṃ,
anya-e1205n0:51_0: Yakkhe damitvā sambuddho dhātuṃ datvāna nāyako,
anya-e1205n0:52_0: Gantvāna uruvelaṃ so vasī tattha vane jino.
anya-e1205n0:54_0: Dutiyagamane pana bodhito pañcame vasse jetavanamahāvihāre vasanto cūḷodara’mahodarānaṃ mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ
anya-e1205n0:54_1: nāgānaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ nissāya saṅgāmaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ disvā sayaṃ pattacīvaramādāya cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe
anya-e1205n0:54_2: uposathadivase nāgadīpaṃ gantvā tesaṃ saṅgāmamajjhe ākāse nisinno andhakāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:54_3: Te andhakārābhibhūte samassāsetvā ālokaṃ dassetvā attano saraṇabhūtānaṃ tesaṃ sāmaggikaraṇatthaṃ phalabharitarukkhaṃ cālento viya dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e1205n0:54_4: Te ubhopi dhamme pasīditvā tampi pallaṅkaṃ tathāgatassa adaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:54_5: Bhagavā pallaṅke nisinno dibbannapānehi santappito bhattānumodanaṃ katvā asītikoṭiyo nāge saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:54_6: Tasmiṃ samāgame mahodarassa mātulo maṇiakkhiko nāma nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ puna kalyāṇidesamāgamanatthaṃ. Ayāci.
anya-e1205n0:60_0: Tatiyagamane pana bodhito aṭṭhame vasse jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto bhagavā?
anya-e1205n0:60_2: so dīpo bahu bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakopāsikādi ariyagaṇasevito kāsāvapajjoto bhavissati,
anya-e1205n0:60_3: mayhaṃ catunnaṃ dāṭhādhātunaṃ antare ekā dāṭhā ca dakkhiṇaakkhadhātu ca nalāṭadhātu ca rāmagāmavāsīhi
anya-e1205n0:60_4: laddho ekakoṭṭhāso ca aññe bahusarīradhātu ca kesadhātuyo ca tattheva patiṭṭhahissanti anekāni saṅghārāmasahassāni ca.
anya-e1205n0:60_6: Tasmā laṅkādīpaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī “ti cintetvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi?
anya-e1205n0:60_9: Ānandatthero kapilavatthukoḷiya nagaravāsīnaṃ pañcasatamahākhīṇāsavānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭivedesi.
anya-e1205n0:60_10: Te paṭiveditā pañcasatakhīṇāsavā pattacīvaradhārā hutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:60_11: Satthuno pana salalāya nāma gandhakuṭiyā avidūre rattasetanīluppalakumudapadumapuṇḍarīkasatapattasahassapattajalajehi
anya-e1205n0:60_15: Tattha adhivattho mahānubhāvo sumanonāma nāgarājā soḷasasahassamattāhi nāgamāṇavikāhi parivuto mahantaṃ
anya-e1205n0:60_16: sirisampattiṃ anubhavamāno tathāgatassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā mahantaṃ sukhasomanassaṃ
anya-e1205n0:60_17: anubhavamāno attano mātaraṃ nandanāgamānavikaṃ garuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassā veyyāvaccaṃ kurumāno tasmiṃyeva
anya-e1205n0:60_19: Satthā pana attano gamanaṃ saṃvidhānānantare sumanaṃ nāgarājānaṃ avidure ṭhitaṃ āmantetvā saparivāro āgacchā hīti āha.
anya-e1205n0:60_20: So sādhuti sampaṭicchitvā attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā supuppītacampakarukkhaṃ tathāgatassa sūriyaraṃsinivāraṇatthaṃ chattaṃ katvā gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:60_21: Atha bhagavā ravirasmipatthaṭasuvaṇṇapabbato viya virocamāno attano pattacīvaramādāya ākāsaṃ abbhūggañchi.
anya-e1205n0:60_22: Satthāraṃ parivāretvā ṭhītā te pañcasatakhīṇāsavāpi sakaṃ sakaṃ pattacīvaramādāya ākāsaṃ uggantvā satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:60_23: Satthā pañcasatakhīṇāsavaparivuto visākhapuṇṇamuposathadivase kalyāṇiyaṃ gantvā mahārahe maṇḍapamajjhe
anya-e1205n0:61_0: Atha maṇiakkhiko nāma nāgarājā buddhapamukhaṃ bhikkhu saṅghaṃ anekehi dibbehi khajjabhojjehi santappetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:61_1: Satthā tassa bhattānumodanaṃ katvā sumanakuṭe padalañchanaṃ dassetvā tasmiṃ pabbatapāde anekapādapākiṇṇabhūmippadese
anya-e1205n0:61_2: nisinno divāvihāraṃ katvā tato vuṭṭhāya dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne samāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_3: Mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā satavāraṃ sahassavāraṃ saṅkampi.
anya-e1205n0:61_4: Tattha mahāsenaṃ nāma devaputtaṃ ārakkhatthāya nivattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya mahāthūpaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_6: Tatrāpi visālarūpa devaputtaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanatthāya ṭhapetvā tato vuṭṭhāya thūpārāma cetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_9: Nivattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya maricavaṭṭicetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ samāpattiṃ appayi.
anya-e1205n0:61_11: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne indakadevaputtaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanatthāya ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:61_12: Tato vuṭṭhāya kācaragāmacetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_14: (Tasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāghosa devaputtaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanatthāya niyyādesi) etasmiṃ mahācetiyaṭṭhāne mahāghosaṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_15: nāma devaputtaṃ ārakkhaṃ gahaṇatthāya nivattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya tissamahāvihāracetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_18: Tattha maṇimekhalaṃ nāma devadhītaraṃ ārakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā tato nāgamahāvihāracetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_20: Tasmimpi mahindaṃ nāma devaputtaṃ ārakkhaṃ gahaṇatthāya ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:61_21: Tato vuṭṭhāya mahāgaṅgāya dakkhiṇadisābhāge seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake atimanoramaṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_22: udakabubbuḷakelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṃ cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhahissatī’ti pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi saddhiṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_24: Bahalaghanamahāpathavi paribbhamitakumbhakāracakkaṃ viya pabhintamadamahā hatthināgassa kuñcanādakaraṇaṃ viya ucchukoṭṭana yanta-
anya-e1205n0:61_25: mukhasaddo viya (ca) satavāraṃ sahassavāraṃ nadamānā somanassappattā viya sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ unnādaṃ kurumānā saṃkampi.
anya-e1205n0:61_26: Tato vuṭṭhāya sumananāgarañño hatthesu ṭhita campakarukkhato pupphāni ādāya tattha pūjetvā punappunaṃ taṃ olokesi.
anya-e1205n0:61_27: So satthāraṃ vanditvā mayā bhante kiṃ kattabbanti pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:61_29: So taṃ sutvā bhante tumhākaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ mama ārakkhaṃ karontassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ asītyānubyañjanabyāmappabhādvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇavicittaṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_30: dassanānuttariyabhūtaṃ passantassa manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamahāmegho
anya-e1205n0:61_31: viya ākāsagaṅgaṃ otaranto viya ratanadāmaṃ ganthento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ savanīyasaraṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e1205n0:61_32: bramhaghosaṃ nicchārento nānānayehi vicittakathaṃ kathayamānānaṃ savanānurittayabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṇṇavanimuggānaṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_36: Na sakkomi aññattha tumhehi vinā vasitunti āha.
anya-e1205n0:61_39: Kakusandhassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhitā,
anya-e1205n0:61_40: tvameva tasmiṃ kāle varaniddo nāma nāgarājā hutvā tassā dhātuyā ārakkhaṃ gahetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karonto ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:61_41: Puna koṇāgamanassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhitā tvameva tasmiṃ kāle jayaseno nāma devaputto
anya-e1205n0:61_42: hutvā tassā dhātuyā ārakkhaṃ gahetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā tattheva ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:61_43: Puna kassapassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhitā.
anya-e1205n0:61_44: Tvameva tasmiṃ kāle dīghasālo nāma nāgarājā hutvā tāya dhātuyā ārakkhaṃ gahetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karonto vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:61_45: Mayi pana parinibbute kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā mayhaṃ nalāṭadhātuṃ imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpessati,
anya-e1205n0:61_46: tasmā tvaṃ imassa ṭhānassa ārakkhaṃ karohīti vatvā pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi saddhiṃ
anya-e1205n0:61_47: cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tvaṃ appamatto hohīti vatvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā jetavanameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:62_0: Tassa pana nāgarañño mātā indamānavikā nāma āgantvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā,
anya-e1205n0:62_1: bhante mama putto sumano nāma nāgarājā kuhinti āha.
anya-e1205n0:62_2: Tava putto tambapaṇṇidīpe mahāvālukagaṅgāya dakkhiṇabhāge seru nāma dahassa samīpe varāha nāma soṇḍiyaṃ
anya-e1205n0:62_3: samādhi appitattā attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā bhante ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ
anya-e1205n0:62_5: khamatha meti accayaṃ desetvā mahatiṃ nāgasampattiṃ gahetvā puttassa sumananāgarājassa santikaṃ gantvā
anya-e1205n0:62_6: mahatiṃ issariyasampattiṃ anubhavanti tattheva ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:66_0: Gantvā nāgavaraṃ dīpaṃ agā jetavanaṃ vidu.
anya-e1205n0:72_0: Iti ariyajanapasādanatthāya kate dhātuvaṃse tathāgatassa gamanaṃ nāma paṭhamo paricchedo.
anya-e1205n0:74_0: Puna gantvā nāgadīpaṃ agā jetavanaṃ varaṃ
anya-e1205n0:81_0: Satthā pana tato pañcacattālīsavassāni tipiṭakapariyattidhammaṃ desetvā veneyyajane saṃsārato catuariyamaggaphalapaṭilābhavasena
anya-e1205n0:81_1: uddhāretvā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchime kāle vesālinagaraṃ upanissāya cāpālacetiyaṃ nissāya viharanto
anya-e1205n0:81_2: mārena parinibbānatthāya ārādhito sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāre vissajjesi.
anya-e1205n0:81_5: Tasmā bhikkhusaṅghampi jānāpessāmīti jetavanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:81_6: bhikkhave tathāgatassa na cirasseva tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena parinibbānaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e1205n0:81_7: tumhe sattatiṃsabodhi pakkhiyadhammesu samaggā hutvā ekībhāvā hotha,
anya-e1205n0:81_9: Appamādena tisso sikkhā sampādethāti vatvā puna divase vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātā paṭikkamitvā bhaṇḍagāmaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:81_10: Bhaṇḍagāmato hatthigāmaṃ hatthigāmato ambagāmaṃ ambagāmato jambugāmaṃ jambugāmato nigrodhagāmaṃ nigrodhagāmato
anya-e1205n0:81_11: bhoganagaraṃ bhoganagarato pāvānagaraṃ pāvānagarato kusinārānagaraṃ patto.
anya-e1205n0:81_12: Tattha yamakasālānamantare ṭhīto ānandattheraṃ āmantetvā untarasīsakaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññāpehi kilantosmi ānanda nipajjissāmi’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:81_13: Taṃ sutvā ānandatthero uttarasīsakaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ attharitvā pañcacattālīsavassāni
anya-e1205n0:81_14: asayitabuddhaseyyaṃ sayanto dakkhiṇapassena sato sampajāno anuṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1205n0:90_2: atha kho dasasahassī lokadhātu cakkavāḷesu sālarukkhāpi pupphitā.
anya-e1205n0:90_4: atha kho yaṃ kiñci pupphupagaphalūpaga rukkhajātaṃ sabbampi pupphañca phalañca gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:90_5: Jalesu jalapadumāni thalesu thalapadumāni khandhesu khandhapadumāni sākhāsu sākhāpadumāni latāsu latāpadumāni
anya-e1205n0:90_6: ākāse olambapadumāni piṭṭhipāsāṇe hinditvā satapattapadumāni supupphitāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:90_7: Pathavito yāva brahmaloko tāva dasasahassi cakkavāḷā ekamālāguṇā viya ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:90_8: Devā ākāsato dibbamandāravapāricchattakakoviḷārapupphāni ca candanacuṇṇāni ca samākiranti.
anya-e1205n0:90_11: Evaṃ pūjāvisese pavattamāne paṭhamayāme subhaddaparibbājakaṃ vinetvā majjhimayāme dasasahassi lokadhātu
anya-e1205n0:90_12: devatānaṃ anusāsitvā pacchimayāmāvasāne paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya dutiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
anya-e1205n0:90_14: Tato vuṭṭhāya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:90_15: Tato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānañca samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:95_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavati parinibbute vissakammadevaputto tathāgatassa sarīrappamāṇaṃ varadoṇiṃ ratanehi māpetvā
anya-e1205n0:95_1: visuddhakappāsehi tathāgatassa sarīraṃ veṭhetvā ratanadoṇiyaṃ pakkhipitvā gandhatelehi pūretvā aparāya
anya-e1205n0:95_2: doṇiyā pidahitvā sabbagandhadārucitakaṃ katvā yebhuyyena devatāyo lohitacandanaghaṭikāyo ādāya citakāyaṃ
anya-e1205n0:95_5: So āyasmā mahākassapatthero yebhuyyena bahunnaṃ devānaṃ piyo manāpo.
anya-e1205n0:95_6: Therassa hi dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattānaṃ pamāṇo nāma natthi.
anya-e1205n0:95_7: Tasmā devatā tasmiṃ samāgame attano kulūpagattheraṃ adisvā amhākaṃ mahākassapatthero kuhinti olokento
anya-e1205n0:95_8: attano parivārehi pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannoti ñatvā yāva thero imasmiṃ na sampatto
anya-e1205n0:95_10: Tasmiṃ kāle thero yebhuyyena terasadhutaṅgadharehi pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ āgantvā citakaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pādapasse ṭhīto,
anya-e1205n0:95_11: bhante tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttarasatthuno pādamule abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya avijahitvā āgato.
anya-e1205n0:95_12: Idāni me avasānadassananti pāde gahetvā vandituṃ adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:102_0: Uho hatthehi paggayha ṭhapetvā attano sire;
anya-e1205n0:104_0: Puṇṇacando yathā abbhaṃ citakaṃ pāvisi tadā;
anya-e1205n0:105_0: Idaṃ accherakaṃ disvā ravaṃ ravi mahājano.
anya-e1205n0:108_0: Tadā mallarājāno bhagavato sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmāti vatvā nānāvatthābharaṇāni nivāsetvā parivārayiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:108_1: Tato rājāno manussā ca aggiṃ dātuṃ ārahiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:108_3: Mayi pana parinibbute sakko devarājā maṇijotirasaṃ pasāretvā nikkhantaagginā mama sarīrakiccaṃ karissati.
anya-e1205n0:108_5: Evaṃ buddhavacanaṃ paribhāvetvā nikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhagavato sarīrakiccaṃ katvā samantato uṭṭhahatuti adhiṭṭhahi.
anya-e1205n0:109_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sayameva citakaṃ aggi gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:109_1: Sarīraṃ pana bhagavato jhāyāmānaṃ chavicammamaṃsanahāruaṭṭhiaṭṭhimiñjaṃ asesetvā sumanamakuḷamuttārāsisadisameva dhātuyo avasesā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:111_0: Paridevo mahā āsi mahī udriyanaṃ yathā.
anya-e1205n0:114_0: Yañca abbhantaraṃ dussaṃ yaṃ dussaṃ sabbabāhiraṃ
anya-e1205n0:115_0: Dusse dveva na jhāyiṃsu tesaṃ dussānamantare;
anya-e1205n0:116_0: Yathā niruddhatelassa na masī na ca chārikā;
anya-e1205n0:120_0: Dāṭhā catasso uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca sattimā;
anya-e1205n0:121_0: Na vikiṇṇā tato sesā vippakiṇṇāva dhātuyo.
anya-e1205n0:136_0: Evaṃ pana sabbaloke karuṇādhiko sammāsambuddho vesākhapuṇṇamuposathe aṅgāradivase parinibbuto.
anya-e1205n0:136_1: Devamanussānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya yamakasālānamantare citakaṃ sattarattindivaṃ vasī.
anya-e1205n0:136_2: Tato vīsaṃ hatthasatikassa upari sattarattindivaṃ vasi.
anya-e1205n0:137_0: Tato sattadivasāni kusinārāyaṃ mallarājaputtesu gandhodakena citakaṃ nibbāpayamānesu sālarukkhato udakadhārā nikkhamitvā citakaṃ nibbāpayiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:137_1: Tato dasabalassa dhātuyo suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭake pakkhipitvā attano nagare santhāgāre ṭhapetvā sattipañjaraṃ
anya-e1205n0:137_2: katvā dhanupākārehi parikkhipāpetvā sattāhaṃ naccagītavāditagandhamālādīhi mallarājaputtā sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:146_0: Hatthīhi parikkhipāpesuṃ tato asse tato rathe,
anya-e1205n0:147_0: Añño’ññaṃ parivāretvā tato yodhe tato dhanu;
anya-e1205n0:149_0: Tadā naccehi gītehi vāditehi ca pūjayuṃ.)
anya-e1205n0:151_0: Tato bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā ajātasattu mahārājā kosinārakānaṃ mallānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1205n0:151_1: Ahampi khattiyo bhagavāpi khattiyo satthuno sarīradhātunaṃ thūpañca mahañca karomīti.
anya-e1205n0:151_2: Teneva upāyena vesāliyaṃ licchavirājāno ca kapilavatthumhi sakyarājāno ca allakappake bulayo ca rāmagāmake
anya-e1205n0:151_3: koḷiyā ca veṭhadīpake brāhmaṇo ca pāvāyaṃ pāveyyakā ca sāsanaṃ pesetvā sabbe ekato hutvā kosinārakehi
anya-e1205n0:151_5: Tesaṃ pana ācariyo droṇabrāhmaṇo nāma. So tesaṃ?
anya-e1205n0:151_7: amhākaṃ bhagavā khantivādīyevāti vatvā tādisassa ca khantimettānuddayasampannassa sarīrabhāge kalahaṃ kātuṃ ayuttanti āha.
anya-e1205n0:153_0: Sakyā ca allakappā ca koḷiyāpi ca rāmake.
anya-e1205n0:155_0: Mallā ca dhātu atthāya aññamaññaṃ vivādayuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:156_0: Evaṃ sante tadā doṇo brāhmaṇo etadabravī;
anya-e1205n0:161_0: Kopaṃ akatvā aññesu khantimeva akā jino.
anya-e1205n0:164_0: Evaṃ bhavataṃ vivāde sampahāro na sādhuko;
anya-e1205n0:167_0: Thūpā vitthāritā hontu pasannā hi bahujjanā.
anya-e1205n0:168_0: Tena hi vibhajehi tvaṃ aṭṭhabhāgantu brāhmaṇa;
anya-e1205n0:169_0: Thūpā vitthāritā hontu pasannā hi bahujjanā.
anya-e1205n0:170_0: Evaṃ vutte tadā doṇo brāhmaṇo gaṇajeṭṭhako;
anya-e1205n0:171_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ nāḷiṃ katvāna samaṃ bhājesi rājunaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:173_0: Ekekapuravāsīnaṃ dve dve doṇo adā tadā.
anya-e1205n0:175_0: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:178_0: Ekā dāṭhā tidasapure ekā nāgapure ahu;
anya-e1205n0:180_2: So dhātuyo vibhajanto ekaṃ dakkhiṇadāṭhādhātuṃ gahetvā veṭhantare ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:180_3: Tadā sakko ajja dakkhiṇadāṭhādhātuṃ ko labhatīti cintetvā veṭhantare passi.
anya-e1205n0:180_4: So ratanacaṅgoṭakaṃ gahetvā adissamānakāyena gantvā dhātuṃ gahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavane cūḷāmaṇicetiya ekayojanubbedhaṃyeva mahantaṃ thūpaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:181_0: Tadā jayaseno nāma nāgarājā bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā ajja pacchimadassanaṃ passissāmīti mahantaṃ
anya-e1205n0:181_1: nāgarājasampattiṃ gahetvā kusināraṃ gantvā mahāpūjaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā pādaggantare ṭhitaṃ dhātuṃ
anya-e1205n0:181_2: disvā nāgeddhibalena gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ netvā nāgapurassa majjhe ratanakhacite cetiye ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:181_3: Taṃ tambapaṇṇiyaṃ kākavaṇṇatissarājakāle mahādevattherassa sisso mahindatthero nāma nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā
anya-e1205n0:181_4: dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇiyaṃ serunagaraṃ haritvā giriabhayassa serunagarapabbatantare cetiyaṃ
anya-e1205n0:183_1: Ekā vāmadāṭhā doṇo nāma ācariyo nivattha vatthantare ṭhapetvā gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:183_2: Tadā eko gandhāravāsī pubbe laddhabyākaraṇo katābhinīhāro vatthantare ṭhatapidantadhātuṃ disvā kusalacittena
anya-e1205n0:183_3: tato dantadhātuṃ gahetvā gandhāravāsikehi saddhiṃ attano raṭṭhaṃ gantvā cetiyavane ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:185_0: Tattha adho vāmadantadhātuṃ sāriputtattherassa sisso khemo nāma muni jālacitakatova uppatitvā vāmadāṭhaṃ
anya-e1205n0:185_1: gahetvā kāliṅgapuraṃ netvā brahmadattassa rañño samīpaṃ gantvā dantadhātuṃ dassetvā?
anya-e1205n0:185_2: Mahārāja vāmadantadhātuṃ bhagavā tameva imasmiṃ jambudīpe yāva guhasīvaparamparā devamanussānaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e1205n0:185_3: karitvā pariyosāne guhasīvarañño pāhessatīti (nīyādetuṃ) āhāti nīyyādesi.
anya-e1205n0:186_0: Aparabhāge hemamālā rājakaññā dantakumārena saddhiṃ brāhmaṇavesaṃ gahetvā dantadhātuṃ ādāya palāyitvā
anya-e1205n0:186_1: vāṇije ārocetvā nāvā vegena gantvā ceva nāgasupaṇṇehi mahantaṃ pūjaṃ kāretvā anukkamenāgantvā jambukoḷapaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e1205n0:186_2: patvā dijavarassa ācikkhitamaggena anurādhapuraṃ patvā kittissirimeghassa pavattiṃ pucchitvā navavassaāyusamāno
anya-e1205n0:186_3: tīsu saraṇesu pasannabhāvaṃ sutvā meghagiri mahātherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā
anya-e1205n0:186_4: dantadhātuṃ jambudīpato gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ ārocetvā dassesi.
anya-e1205n0:186_5: Disvā ca pana pītiyā phuṭo ubhinnampi saṅgahaṃ katvā mahāvihāraṃ alaṅkāretvā jinadantadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e1205n0:186_6: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:186_7: Taṃ sutvā rājā pītipāmojjo cakkavattissa sirisampatto daḷiddo viya tassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā vīmaṃsitvā nikkaṅkho hutvā sakalalaṅkādīpena pūjesi.
anya-e1205n0:186_8: Etena nayena pūjaṃ katvā ekadivaseneva navalakkhaṃ pūjesi.
anya-e1205n0:188_0: Gāme ca issare ceva datvāna saṅgahaṃ akā.
anya-e1205n0:190_0: Cattālīsa samā dantā kesā lomā ca sabbaso devā hariṃsu ekekaṃ cakkavāḷaparamparā.
anya-e1205n0:191_2: Sesadantā ca kesā ca lomā ca nakhā ca sabbasopi mayi parinibbuta-
anya-e1205n0:191_3: kāle mā ḍayhantu luñcitvā ākāse patiṭṭhantu ekekacakkavāḷañca ekekakesalomanakhadantadhātuparamparā netvā
anya-e1205n0:191_4: cetiyaṃ kāretvāna devamanussānaṃ atthaṃ karotuti adhiṭṭhahi.
anya-e1205n0:191_5: Tasmā parinibbutakālato yāva sarīraṃ na ḍayhati tāva chabbaṇṇarasmiyo lomadhātu na pajahati.
anya-e1205n0:191_6: Doṇabrāhmaṇopi dhātuvibhajanāvasāne veṭhantare ca nivāsanantare ca pādaggantare ca dhātunaṃ vinaṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā pathaviyaṃ uttānakoyevajāto.
anya-e1205n0:191_7: Tadā sakko devarājā disvā ayaṃ deṇācariyo dhātu atthāya anuparivattetvā vināsaṃ pāpuṇeyya ahaṃ vīṇācariyavesaṃ
anya-e1205n0:191_8: gahetvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā sokaṃ vinodessāmīti sakkarūpaṃ jahitvā vīṇācariyavesaṃ gahetvā tassa santikaṃ
anya-e1205n0:191_9: gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito dibbagītaṃ gāyitvā vīṇaṃ vādento nānappakāraṃ udānesi.
anya-e1205n0:191_10: Yaṃ dhammametaṃ purisassa vādaṃ chindissāmīti vatvā kathāya sotunaṃ lobhaṃ parassa atthaṃ vināsetvā atilobhena puriso pāpako hotīti.
anya-e1205n0:191_11: Haṃsarājajātakaṃ dīpetvā yaṃ laddhaṃ taṃ suladdhanti āha.
anya-e1205n0:191_12: Taṃ sutvā doṇo ayaṃ vīṇācariyo mayhaṃ thenabhāvaṃ aññāsīti sokaṃ vinodetvā uṭṭhāya āvajjamāno tumbaṃ
anya-e1205n0:191_13: disvā yena bhagavato sarīradhātuyo mitā sopi dhātugatikova.
anya-e1205n0:191_14: Idaṃ thūpaṃ karissāmīti cintetvā tumbaṃ gahetvāna cetiye ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:191_15: Moriyā aṅgāraṃ gahetvā aṅgāracetiyaṃ nāma kāresuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:208_0: Te pana rājāno hi attanoladdhadhātuṃ gahetvā sakasakanagaraṃ gantvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahantaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:208_1: Cakkhumantassa bhagavato sarīradhātu aṭṭhadoṇamattaṃ suvaṇṇanāḷiyā ekasataaṭṭhavīsatināḷikā ahosi?
anya-e1205n0:208_2: Satthā pana uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:208_10: Mahākassapattherā ca anuruddhatthero ca dve mahātherā bhagavato sarīradhātuyo vissajjāpetvā adaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:209_0: Tesaṃ rājunaṃ bhagavato sarīradhātuṃ labhitvā sattadivasasattamāsādhikāni sattavassāni mahārahaṃ pūjaṃ katvā gatakāle micchādiṭṭhikamanussā?
anya-e1205n0:209_2: Tassa dhātu atthāya amhākaṃ jīvitakappanaṃ nāsetvā pūjaṃ karotī’ti sammāsambuddhe padussanti.
anya-e1205n0:209_3: Sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā mahākassapattherassa ārocesi;’bhante micchādiṭṭhikā manussā bhagavati
anya-e1205n0:209_5: Bahutarā anāgate micchādiṭṭhikā mātupitughātakā rājāno bhavissanti.
anya-e1205n0:209_6: Ajjeva dhātuyo nidahituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti thero vicāretvā addasa.
anya-e1205n0:210_0: Anantamatthaṃ dharamānakāle katvāna sattānamalīnacitto sesānamatthāya sarīradhātuṃ ṭhapetva so maccumukhaṃ upeto.
anya-e1205n0:210_1: (Katvā yo bodhiñāṇaṃ vividhabalavaraṃ bujjhituṃ pāramīyo vatvā saṅkheyyapuṇṇe aparimitabhave uttaritvā sumuttaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:210_2: Ārohitvāna sīghaṃ ariyasivapadaṃ accutaṃ sītibhāvaṃ patto so jātipāraṃ nikhilapadahanaṃ dukkaraṃ kārayitvā.
anya-e1205n0:222_0: Abbhantare ṭhapesi rājā sabbā tā buddhadhātuyo.
anya-e1205n0:244_0: Iti ariyajanappasādanatthāya kate dhātuvaṃse tathāgatassa parinibbutādhikāro nāma dutiyo paricchedo.
anya-e1205n0:246_0: Dhātusu pana vibhajitvā dīyamānesu satthuno nalāṭadhātu kosinārakānaṃ mallānaṃ laddhakoṭṭhāseyeva ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:246_1: Mahākassapatthero te upasaṅkamitvā satthuno nalāṭadhātu tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāse ahosi,
anya-e1205n0:246_5: Taṃ sutvā mallarājāno?’Evaṃ patigaṇhatha bhante dhātu’ti mahākassapattherassa adaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:246_6: So attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahānandattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā nalāṭadhātuṃ therassa niyyādetvā’ imaṃ dhātuṃ
anya-e1205n0:246_7: tambapaṇṇi dīpe mahāvālukagaṅgāya dakkhiṇabhāge serunāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake kākavaṇṇatisso
anya-e1205n0:246_10: tvaṃ imaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā vesāliyaṃ upanissāya mahāvanavihāre kuṭāgārasālāyaṃ satthuno vasitagandhakuṭiyaṃ
anya-e1205n0:246_11: ṭhapetvā dhātupūjaṃ katvā āyusaṅkhāre ossaṭṭhe parinibbāpayamāne attano saddhivihārikassa candaguttattherassa
anya-e1205n0:246_12: dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā appamatto hohī’ti vatvā dhātuṃ therassa datvā anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e1205n0:249_0: Tassa therassa saddhivihāriko candaguttatthero dhātuṃ gahetvā ākāsaṃ uggantvā sāvatthīyaṃ jetavanamahāvihāre
anya-e1205n0:249_1: dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā dhātupūjaṃ katvā ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:249_3: Saddhivihārikaṃ bhaddasenattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā dhātuṃ therassa niyyādetvā dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā anusāsitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e1205n0:251_0: Ramme jetavane dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā vandanaṃ akā.
anya-e1205n0:252_0: Tassa sisso bhaddasenatthero dhātuṃ gahetvā ākāsena gantvā dhammacakkappavattane isipatane mahā vihāre
anya-e1205n0:252_1: satthuno vasitagandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:252_2: So parinibbāpayamāno attano saddhivihārikassa jayasenattherassa dhātuṃ niyyādetvā dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e1205n0:254_0: Dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā isipatane vanditvā nibbutiṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:255_0: So pana jayasenatthero taṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā veluvanamahāvihāre satthuno vasitagandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā gandhamālādīhi
anya-e1205n0:255_1: pūjetvā ciraṃ vasitvā parinibbāpayamāno attano saddhivihārikassa mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa dhātuṃ niyyādetvā
anya-e1205n0:257_0: Nidhāya veluvane ramme akā pūjaṃ manoramaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:258_0: So panāyasmā saṅgharakkhitatthero dhātuṃ gahetvā ākāsena āgantvā kosambiṃ upanissāya ghosita seṭṭhinā
anya-e1205n0:258_1: kārāpite ghositārāme bhagavato vasitagandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:258_2: So’pi parinibbāpayamāno attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahādevattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā appamatto
anya-e1205n0:261_0: Tassa therassa saddhivihāriko mahādevatthero dhātuṃ gahetvā devānampiyatissassa mahārañño bhātu mahānāgassa
anya-e1205n0:261_1: uparājassa mahāgāme setacchattaṃ ussāpitakāle hatthoṭṭha nāmajanapade kukkuṭapabbatantare mahāsālarukkhamūle
anya-e1205n0:261_3: Tasmiṃ samaye mahākāḷo nāma upāsako attano puttadārehi saddhiṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhajapatākādīni gāhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:261_4: divasassa tikkhattuṃ mahantehi pūjāvidhānehi dhātuṃ pariharitvā ciraṃ vasi.
anya-e1205n0:261_7: Tasmiṃ samaye so padeso buddhassa dharamānakālo viya ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:261_8: Janapadavāsī manussāpi therassa santike sīlāni gaṇhanti,
anya-e1205n0:261_12: Tato aparabhāge uparājā mahāgāme viharanto bheriṃ carāpesi?
anya-e1205n0:261_13: Yo amhākaṃ dasabalassa dhātuṃ gahetvā idhāgato,
anya-e1205n0:261_15: Tasmiṃ kāle kuṭumbiko mahākāḷo uparājaṃ passissāmīti tassa anucchavikaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā rājadvāre ṭhatvā sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
anya-e1205n0:261_17: So gantvā vanditvā ṭhito taṃ paṇṇākāraṃ rājapurisānaṃ paṭicchāpesi. Uparājā?
anya-e1205n0:261_19: tumhākaṃ janapade amhākaṃ satthuno dhātu atthī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:261_20: Mahākāḷo upa rājassa kathaṃ sutvā atthi deva,
anya-e1205n0:261_21: mayhaṃ kulupagattherassa santike ādāsamaṇḍalappamāṇaṃ satthuno nalāṭadhātu chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi ākāsappadese
anya-e1205n0:261_23: So janapado buddhassa uppannakālo viya ahosīti āha.
anya-e1205n0:261_24: Tassa kuṭumbikassa kathaṃ suṇantassaeva rañño sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripuṇṇaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:261_25: Ativiya somanassappatto rājā mayhaṃ mātulassa mahākāḷassa satasahassaṃ kahāpaṇāni ca catusindhavayuttarathañca
anya-e1205n0:261_26: suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi susajjitaṃ ekaṃ assañca udakaphāsukaṭṭhānake khettañca pañcadāsīsatañca dethā’ti vatvā
anya-e1205n0:261_28: So uparājā ettakaṃ kuṭumbikassa dāpetvā taṃ divasameva nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā hatthassarathayānāni gahetvā
anya-e1205n0:261_29: kuṭumbikaṃ maggadesakaṃ katvā anupubbena hatthoṭṭhajanapadaṃ patvā ramaṇīye bhūmippadese khandhāvāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:261_30: bandhitvā amaccagaṇaparivuto kuṭumbikaṃ gahetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:261_31: Sesā amaccā kuṭumbiko ca theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:261_32: Uparājā theraṃ vanditvā sārāṇīyaṃ kathaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāramakāsi.
anya-e1205n0:261_33: Mahādevattheropi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ katvā kissa tvaṃ mahārāja idhāgatosi āgatakāraṇaṃ me ārocehī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:261_35: Santike amhākaṃ bhagavato nalāṭadhātu atthī kira.
anya-e1205n0:261_37: Bhaddakaṃ mahā rāja tayā katanti vatvā dhātugharadvāraṃ vivaritvā mahārāja buddhassa nalāṭadhātu atidullabhā’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:261_38: Rājā soḷasehi gandhodakehi nahāyitvā sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍito ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:263_0: Namāmi vīra pāde te cakkaṅkita tale subhe;
anya-e1205n0:266_0: Loke tayā samo natthi tārehi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:271_1: Sakala laṅkādīpaṃ suvaṇṇarasadhārāhi sañchannaṃ viya ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:271_3: Rājā mahantaṃ somanassaṃ patto hutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:271_4: So dhātugharato nikkhamitvā therena saddhiṃ alaṅkatamaṇḍape ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:271_11: Atidūre nisinno sace kathetukāmo uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e1205n0:271_15: Atisammukhe nisinno cakkhunā cakkhuṃ paharitvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e1205n0:271_16: Atipacchā nisinno gīvaṃ parivattetvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e1205n0:271_20: Bhaddakaṃ mahārāja imāya dhātuyā sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vyākaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:271_21: Tumhākaṃ vaṃse jāto kākavaṇṇatisso nāma rājā imasmiṃ dīpe mahāvālukagaṅgāya dakkhiṇatīre seru nāma dahassa
anya-e1205n0:271_22: ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake patiṭṭhapetvā mahantaṃ thūpaṃ karissatī’ti vatvā satthā tattha samāpattiṃ
anya-e1205n0:271_23: samāpajjitvā pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi saddhiṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gato.
anya-e1205n0:271_24: Tasmā gaṇhatha mahārājā’ti vatvā dhātuṃ adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:272_0: Rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā caturassapallaṅke dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ nidahitvā karaṇḍake dhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ kumudapattasannihamaṅgalasindhavayuttarathe
anya-e1205n0:272_1: ṭhapetvā samantā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahitvā (rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā) pañcaṅgaturiye paggaṇhāpayamāno pacchā āgacchatu’ti
anya-e1205n0:272_2: mahājanassa sāsanaṃ vatvā mahādevattherassa santikaṃ gantvā?
anya-e1205n0:272_5: Thero tassa kathaṃ sutvā;’mahārāja ayaṃ dhātu paramparā āgatā.
anya-e1205n0:272_6: Ahaṃ bhagavato dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandatthero viya imaṃ dhātuṃ pariharissāmī’ti vatvā attano paccayadāyakaṃ
anya-e1205n0:272_7: kuṭumbikaṃ āpucchitvā pattacīvaramādāya dhātuṃ upaṭṭhahiyamāno pacchato pacchato gacchati.
anya-e1205n0:272_8: Rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā anupubbena mahāgāmaṃ patto mahāsenaguttaṃ pakkosāpetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkarāpehī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:272_9: So nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā aṭṭhārasa vīthiyo sammajjantu,
anya-e1205n0:272_15: gandhamālādayo gahetvā suddhuttarāsaṅgā hutvā sakalanāgarā paṭipathaṃ āgacchantuti āṇāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:272_16: Tato mahājano sabbaturiyāni ghosāpayamāno gandhamālādihattho paṭipathaṃ nikkhanto.
anya-e1205n0:272_20: So rājā nagare bandhanāgāre sabbasatte bandhanā muñcantu,
anya-e1205n0:272_21: dhammena samena anusāsantuti vatvā dhātuṃ gahetvā attano nagaraṃ pavesetvā attano rājanivesanaṃ āgantvā nāṭakīnaṃ saññamadāsi dhātuṃ vandantuti.
anya-e1205n0:272_22: Nāṭakī nānābharaṇehi patimaṇḍitā rājagehato nikkhamitvā dhātuṃ vanditvā attano attano hatthagatāni turiyabhaṇḍāni
anya-e1205n0:273_0: Tato vaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā rājanivesanato nātidūre nāccāsante subhumitale dhātugharaṃ kārāpetvā mālākammalatākammādiṃ
anya-e1205n0:273_1: patiṭṭhāpetvā dhātughare vicittamaṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvāna sattaratanamayaṃ dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ kārāpetvā dhātukaraṇḍake
anya-e1205n0:273_2: dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā ratanapallaṅka matthake dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā upari vicittavitānaṃ bandhitvā sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:273_4: Mahājanā gandhamālaṃ gahetvā māsassa aṭṭhūposathadivase dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:273_7: Somanassabhūtā sakalanagaravāsino buddhārammaṇa pītiṃ gahetvā divase divase dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ karontā vītināmenti.
anya-e1205n0:273_9: buddhamāmakā dhammamāmakā saṅghamāmakā hutvā saraṇāni gacchanti.
anya-e1205n0:273_14: Ovaditvā bhikkhusaṅghassapi cattāro paccaye gaṅgāya maho-
anya-e1205n0:273_17: Mahājanā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yebhuyyena tasmiṃ kāle matā saggaṃ gatā.
anya-e1205n0:278_0: Rājā dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ karonto mahagāme vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:278_2: Lenavihāraṃ candagirivihāraṃ koṭipabbatavihāraṃ nagaraṅgaṇavihāraṃ selakā vihāraṃ talākāvihāranti evamādayo
anya-e1205n0:278_3: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā tipiṭakamahāariṭṭhattherassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā mahāvihāre niyyādesi.
anya-e1205n0:278_4: Evaṃ so rājā yāvajīvaṃ dhātuṃ pariharitvā pacchime kāle maraṇamañce nipanno attano puttaṃ yaṭālatissa kumāraṃ pakkosāpetvā;
anya-e1205n0:278_6: amhehi pariharita nalāṭadhātu pūjehī’ti dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā puttaṃ anusāsitvā kālaṃ katvā saggapuraṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:283_0: Tassa putto yaṭālatissakumāro pitu accayena pitarā vuttaniyāmeneva dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1205n0:283_1: So’pi divasassa tayo vāre dhātupaṭṭhānaṃ karonto rajjaṃ kāretvā ciraṃ vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:283_4: tipiṭakamahāariṭṭhattherassa saddhivihāriko tipiṭakamahāabhayatthero uparājassa mahānāgassa ayyako.
anya-e1205n0:283_6: So’pi rājā yāvajīvaṃ dhātuṃ pariharitvā pacchime kāle maraṇamañce nipanno attano puttaṃ goṭhābhayakumāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:283_7: pakkosāpetvā’dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ karonto appamatto hohī’ti vatvā dhātuvaṃsaṃ kathetvā kālaṃ katvā
anya-e1205n0:288_0: Tassa putto goṭhābhayakumāro pitu accayena pitarā vuttaniyāmeneva dhātuyā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ katvā goṭhābhaya
anya-e1205n0:288_1: mahārājā hutvā rajjaṃ karonto kācaragāme dasabhātike rājāno ghātetvā daṇḍakammatthāya goṭhābhayamahātherassa
anya-e1205n0:288_2: hatthoṭṭhajanapade vasantassa mattikalenavihāraṃ khīrasāla vihāraṃ nāgamahāvihāraṃ kumbhaselavihāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:288_3: cetiyapabbatavihāraṃ sānupabbatavihāraṃ kaṇikāra selavihāraṃ ambasela vihāraṃ tindukalena vihāraṃ karaṇḍakavihāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:288_4: godhasālavihāraṃ vālukatitthavihāranti evamādayo gaṅgāya paratīre pañcasatavihāre orimatīre pañcasatavihāre
anya-e1205n0:288_5: cā’ti vihārasahassaṃ kāretvā attano sadisanāmassa goṭhābhayattherassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:288_6: So yāvajīvaṃ dhātupūjaṃ katvā pacchime kāle maraṇamañce nipanno attano puttaṃ kākavaṇṇatissa kumāraṃ pakkosāpetvā āliṅgitvā;’tāta tissa,
anya-e1205n0:288_8: Tvaṃ kira dhātuṃ gahetvā mahāgaṅgāya passe seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:288_10: Tasmā tvaṃ imaṃ dhātuṃ gahetvā mamaccayena tasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpehī’ti puttaṃ anusāsitvā kālakiriyaṃ katvā sagge nibbatti.
anya-e1205n0:295_0: Jayaseno ca so vīro thero so saṅgharakkhito;
anya-e1205n0:296_0: Devatthero ca medhāvī rakkhakā dhātu bhaddakā.
anya-e1205n0:299_0: Ete therā ca rājāno puññavanto sumānasā;
anya-e1205n0:307_1: (So pana) amhākaṃ satthuno bodhippattito puretarameva mahāmalaya raṭṭhe vanacarakaṃ paṭicca tassa bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:307_2: Navaḍḍhamāsāvasāne mātukucchito nikkhamitvā kamena vaḍḍhanto viññubhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1205n0:307_3: Tassa pitā ekaṃ dārikaṃ ānetvā puttassa gehe akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:307_7: Carako attano nivāsavatthusmiṃ kadalipanasādīni ropetvā phalārāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:307_8: Tato aparabhāge tena ropitapanasarukkho mahantaṃ cāṭippamāṇaṃ panasaphalaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:307_9: Carako attano vatthuṃ gantvā sākhāya supakkaṃ panasaphalaṃ passitvā chinditvā gehaṃ āharitvā apassāyaṃ luñcitvā upadhāresi.
anya-e1205n0:307_10: Tato samantā catumadhuraṃ viya yūsaṃ otaritvā apassayaṃ apanīta āvāṭaṃ pūretvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:307_12: Imaṃ panasaphalaṃ amhākaṃ paccekabuddhena vinā aññesaṃ nānucchavikanti.
anya-e1205n0:308_0: Punadivase paccekabuddho lenato nikkhamitvā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā surattapallavasadisaṃ antaravāsakaṃ
anya-e1205n0:308_1: parimaṇḍalaṃ katvā nivāsetvā bahalapavaramahāpaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā nīlabhamaravaṇṇaṃ pattaṃ hatthena
anya-e1205n0:308_2: gahetvā ākāsena āgantvā tassa kuṭidvāre pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:308_3: Carako kuṭito nikkhamitvā taṃ vanditvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gehaṃ pavesetvā pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā attanā
anya-e1205n0:308_4: ṭhapitaṭṭhānato panasaphalaṃ gahetvā yūsaṃ patte pūretvā paṭiggahāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:308_5: Paccekabuddho taṃ paribhuñjitvā ākāsato attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:308_6: Athekadivasaṃ carako paradesā gacchanto bhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā;’ amma,
anya-e1205n0:308_7: ayyassa appamatto hutvā dānaṃ dehī’ti sabbūpakaraṇaṃ niyyādetvā paradesaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:308_8: Punadivase paccekabuddho lenato nikkhamitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya ākāsato āgantvā kuṭidvāre otaritvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:308_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe carakassa bhariyā kuṭito nikkhamitvā paccekabuddhassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhattaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:309_0: Tena bhattakicce pariniṭṭhite sā taruṇapaccekabuddhaṃ passitvā kilesapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā paccekabuddhassa attano ajjhāsayaṃ kathesi.
anya-e1205n0:309_1: Paccekabuddho tassā kathaṃ sutvā jigucchamāno uppatitvā ākāsato attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:309_2: Sā paccekabuddhassa gatakāle attano sarīraṃ telena makkhetvā bhaṇḍanakā viya nitthunamānā mañce nipajji.
anya-e1205n0:309_3: Carako paradesato āgantvā bhariyaṃ nipajjamānaṃ evamāha?’Bhadde,
anya-e1205n0:309_9: So attanā saddhiṃ kilesavasne okāsaṃ kārāpetuṃ vāyamitvā mayā ayuttanti vutte mama kese gahetvā hatthapādehi
anya-e1205n0:309_10: ākoṭetvā sarīraṃ nakhena ottharitvā sīse paharitvā gato’ti vutte carako taṃ sutvā asahanto (eso mayā)
anya-e1205n0:309_11: evarūpassa assamaṇakammassa posito’ti vatvā tassā sokaṃ vinodetvā dhanuṃ ādāya tikkhasaraṃ gahetvā etaṃ
anya-e1205n0:310_1: Gantvā ca pana kāyabandhanaṃ ākāse cīvaravaṃsaṃ viya katvā nivāsanapāpuraṇaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā jalasāṭakaṃ
anya-e1205n0:310_2: nivāsetvā udakamatthakā ākāse nisīditvā nahāyituṃ ārabhi.
anya-e1205n0:310_3: Carako paccekabuddhassa garugāravakāraṇaṃ passanto gumbantare nilīno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:310_4: Ṭhatvā ca pana evarūpaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā cintesi?
anya-e1205n0:310_7: Ahaṃ etissā vacanaṃ gahetvā evarūpassa samaṇassa akāraṇe aparādhaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e1205n0:310_8: Eso tādisaṃ na karotī’ti cintetvā paccekabuddhassa nahatvā ṭhītakāle gantvā pādesu nipatitvā?’Mayhaṃ khamatha ayyā’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:310_12: Evañhi sati upāsaka tumhākaṃ āgatakammaṃ niṭṭhapetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:310_14: ahaṃ aññāṇabhāvena tassā vacanaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ akāraṇe dubbhituṃ āgatomhi’ti sabbaṃ attanā cintitaṃ ācikkhi.
anya-e1205n0:311_2: sā attanā saddhiṃ asaddhammapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ kathesī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:311_3: So tassā kujjhitvā ahaṃ etaṃ nissāya imassa aparajjhāmi.
anya-e1205n0:311_4: Gantvā taṃ māressāmī’ti paccekabuddhaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā nikkhami.
anya-e1205n0:311_5: Paccekabuddho taṃ nivattetvā mātugāmaṃ mā mārehī’ti anekavidhāni kāraṇāni kathetvā pañcasīle patiṭṭhapetvā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha?
anya-e1205n0:316_0: Carako tassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasantacitto hutvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā gehaṃ gantvā tāya saddhiṃ
anya-e1205n0:316_1: samaggavāsaṃ vasitvā tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ paccekabuddhassa cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārādayo
anya-e1205n0:316_3: So tasmiṃyeva lene vasanto aparabhāge anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e1205n0:321_0: Atha pacchā carako kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbatti.
anya-e1205n0:321_1: Tattha ciraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā devalokato cavitvā imasmiṃ dīpe malaya raṭṭhe amaruppala lenassa
anya-e1205n0:321_4: Tassa nāmagahaṇadivase ñātakā amaruppala kumāroti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:321_5: So pana aparabhāge vaḍḍhento dārakehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto pattapuṭena vālukabhattaṃ pacitvā,
anya-e1205n0:321_6: dārakā ime samaṇāti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ dassāmī’ti vatvā kīḷādānaṃ deti.
anya-e1205n0:321_7: Ekadivasaṃ amaruppala kumāro vālukathupaṃ katvā attano nivāsanavatthadussaṃ gahetvā khuddakadaṇḍake bandhitvā paṭākaṃ katvā pūjanatthāya ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:321_8: Amaruppala lenavāsī maliya devattheraṃ nissāya dānādīni puññāni katvā tato cuto imasmiṃyeva dīpe mahāgāme
anya-e1205n0:321_12: So anupubbena vaḍḍhitvā pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:321_13: Tassa chatte ussāpiteyeva sakalaraṭṭhaṃ subhikkhaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:321_14: Pañca vā dvādasa vā divase anatikkamitvā devo sammā vassati.
anya-e1205n0:321_15: Vessantarabodhisattassa dānagge yācakānaṃ hatthe bhikkhābhājanaṃ viya tasmiṃ kāle vāpīpokkharaṇī- nadī- kandara- sobbha-
anya-e1205n0:322_0: So rājā saddhāya sampanno mahābhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccaye anūnaṃ katvā dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:322_1: Saṭṭhimattānaṃ tipiṭakadharānaṃ candanadoṇiyā satapākatelassa pūrāpetvā yāvapiṭṭhipādaṃ tāva osīdāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:322_2: nisinnānaṃ laṭṭhima dhudantakaṭṭhaṃ catumadhuraṃ pakkhipitvā dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:322_4: phalamūlakhandhakhādanañca nānāvidhamaccharasehi sugandhasālitaṇḍulena sādhitayāgubhattañca pātova adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:322_6: antarakhajjakañca ucchukadalipanasaphalādayo ca nānāvidhottaribhaṅgena saddhiṃ sugandhasālitaṇḍulabhattaṃ
anya-e1205n0:322_7: nānaggarasaṃ dāpetvā pacchābhattaṃ aṭṭhavidhakappīyapānake ca dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:322_9: Iminā niyāmeneva bhikkhusaṅghassa tipiṭakadharabhikkhūnañca nirantaraṃ mahā dānaṃ datvā vasati.
anya-e1205n0:323_0: Athāparena samayena kalyāṇiyaṃ sivo nāma mahārājā attano bhāgineyyassa abhayakumārassa kākavaṇṇatissa
anya-e1205n0:323_1: rañño bhaginiyā somadeviyā nāma rājaputtiyā āvāhamaṅgalaṃ katvā ānetvā pādaparicārikaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:323_2: Datvā ca pana abhaya kumāraṃ girinagaramhi nisīdāpesī.
anya-e1205n0:323_3: So girinagare rajjaṃ kārāpetvā giriabhayo nāma rājā hutvā mahantaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamāno vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:323_4: Tato aparabhāge kākavaṇṇatissa mahārājā mahāgāme viharanto aññatarassa bhikkhussa gatte maṅkunā daṭṭhaṭṭhāne
anya-e1205n0:323_5: gaṇḍaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ disvā kimetaṃ ayyā’ti pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:323_8: bhante maṅkunā kismiṃ na bhavanti’ti pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:323_10: Ime pana bhaddantā paṭṭasāṭake kuto labhantī’ti cintetvā gato.
anya-e1205n0:323_11: Taṃ divasameva pānīyamāḷake nisinno tipiṭakatissatthero nāma rañño buddhasīhanādasuttaṃ nāma kathesi.
anya-e1205n0:323_13: uttarāsaṅge dīyamāne’ekasāṭako bhavissāmi’ tasmā imameva dātuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e1205n0:323_14: kathaṃ karissāmī’ti cintento therena saddhiṃ kathayamāno tattha māḷakeyeva aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:323_15: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko kāko ambasākhantare nisīditvā
anya-e1205n0:328_7: idaṃ tatiyaṃ sāsanaṃ uttara vaḍḍhamānapabbatapāde dvikarīsappamāṇe khette taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā suvaṇṇakkhandhā uggacchiṃsu,
anya-e1205n0:328_9: Giripabbatapāde koṭa raṭṭhaka vihāre koṭaraṭṭhako nāma thero maggopasamaṃ vatvā giripabbatamatthake sattatālappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1205n0:329_0: (Putto hatthī ca nāvā ca catutthaṃ hemakhandhakaṃ;
anya-e1205n0:331_0: Imaṃ gahetvāna ahaṃ āgato tava santikaṃ;
anya-e1205n0:332_0: Sāsanaṃ īdisaṃ sutvā puññakamme rato bhava.
anya-e1205n0:334_0: Idaṃ niccaṃ jānanto kiṃ laggo uttarāsaṅge’ti.)
anya-e1205n0:335_0: Rājā kākassa vacanaṃ sutvā hasi. Thero?
anya-e1205n0:335_2: etasmiṃ ambasākhantare nisīditvā saddaṃ karontassa kākassa kathaṃ sutvā hasinti sabbaṃ ārocesi.
anya-e1205n0:335_3: Thero’pi raññā purimattabhāve katakammaṃ passitvā hasi.
anya-e1205n0:335_4: Rājā kasmā ayyo hasī’ti pucchi. Mahārāja,
anya-e1205n0:335_5: tumhākaṃ anantare attabhāve malayaraṭṭhe amaruppala nāma kāle katakammaṃ passitvā hasitti.
anya-e1205n0:335_6: Tena puṭṭho katakusalakammaṃ sabbaṃ vitthārena tassa ācikkhi.
anya-e1205n0:335_7: Rājā somanassappatto attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ datvā theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:335_8: Koṭaraṭṭhakavihāraṃ gantvā therassa sarīrajjhāpanaṃ kārāpetvā dhātuṃ ādāya cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahantaṃ pūjaṃ katvā mahāgāmaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:335_10: Goṭhasamuddakucchiyaṃ patta nāvāto vatthāni āharāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaratthāya dāpetvā mahādānaṃ
anya-e1205n0:335_11: pavattetvā mahāgāmasamīpe vihāraṃ kārāpetvā viharanto attano puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ pakkosāpetvā; tāta,
anya-e1205n0:335_12: tvaṃ gantvā girimhi nagare nisīdā’ti vatvā amaccañcassa pituṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā girinagaraṃ pāhesi.
anya-e1205n0:335_13: Taṃ disvā giriabhaya kumāro kumārena saddhiṃ āgatabaḷassa vatthāhārādīni dāpetvā mahantaṃ sammānaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:336_0: Tato aparabhāge jātiṃ nissāya khattiyānaṃ vivādo ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:336_1: So abhayarājā kiṃ mevivādenā’ti attano bhariyāya somadeviyā saddhiṃ balavāhanaṃ gahetvā anukkamena gacchanto
anya-e1205n0:336_2: serunagare rajjaṃ kārentaṃ attasahāyaṃ sivarājaṃ sandhāya tassa santikaṃ āgañji.
anya-e1205n0:336_3: So’pi sivarājā giriabhayaraññā saddhiṃ āgatabaḷassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā ahatavatthatilataṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:336_10: Tvaṃ mā cintayī’ti vatvā tassa vasanatthāya nagarabhūmiṃ gavesanto sarakoṭiyaṃ atiramaṇīyabhūmiṃ passitvā
anya-e1205n0:336_11: tasmiṃ bhūmibhāge so nagaraṃ māpetvā deviyā ekasadisanāmaṃ karissāmī’ti somanagaranti nāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:336_12: Taṃ nagaraṃ susamiddhaṃ sampannadhanadhaññādīhi upakaraṇehi dvāraṭṭālakagopuraparikhāpokkhara-
anya-e1205n0:336_13: ṇiyādīhi sahitaṃ hatthiassarathapattiādīhi samākulaṃ saṅkhapaṇavabherisaddādīhi samākiṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:336_14: So abhayo ciraṃ somanagare mahantaṃ issariyaṃ anubhavanto vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:337_0: Athāparasmiṃ kāle somadevī raññā saddhiṃ kathesi;
anya-e1205n0:337_1: ayya amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ cetiyañca vihārañca kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti.
anya-e1205n0:337_2: Bhaddakaṃ te kathitanti somanassappatto hutvā vihārabhūmiṃ gavesanto nagarato nātidure nāccāsanne mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ atthi.
anya-e1205n0:337_4: Tadā tasmiṃ sālavane mahāariṭṭhattherassa vaṃse mahāmahindatthero nāma eko thero atthi.
anya-e1205n0:337_6: Taṃ disvā iriyāpathe pasanno theraṃ evamāha;
anya-e1205n0:337_8: Thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhīhāvena adhivāsesi.
anya-e1205n0:337_9: Rājā somanassappatto theraṃ vanditvā nagarameva gantvā somadeviṃ āmantetvā;
anya-e1205n0:337_13: Tattha ca mahindo nāma thero samaṇānaṃ saṭṭhimattaṃ gahetvā viharati.
anya-e1205n0:337_14: Taṃ vanditvā viharaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā āgato.
anya-e1205n0:337_16: Sā taṃ sutvā somanassappattā sādhū’ti sampaṭicchi.
anya-e1205n0:337_17: Punadivase deviyā saddhiṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:337_19: Te ubho’pi dhammaṃ sutvā somanassajātā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:337_20: Atha rājā ayya dhātuṃ kuto labhissāmā’ti theraṃ pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:338_0: So tato paṭṭhāya vihārabhumiṃ sodhāpetvā khāṇukaṇṭakādayo nīharitvā bheritalamiva ramaṇīyaṃ samaṃ kārāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:338_1: iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā iṭṭhacitaṃ kārāpetvā cetiyakammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:338_2: Vaḍḍhakī cetiyaṃ cinanto katipāhena pupphādhānattayaṃ niṭṭhapetvā dhātugabbhe sabbaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhapetvā rañño paṭivedesi. Rājā,
anya-e1205n0:338_5: Thero rañño vacanaṃ sutvā attanā pariharitaṃ tathāgatassa dakkhiṇadāṭhādhātuṃ tassa adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:338_6: Rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā sunakkhattena sumuhuttena mahatā parivārena dhātugabbhe nidahitvā atimanoramaṃ udakabubbuḷakelāsakuṭapaṭibhāgaṃ cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:341_0: Tato therassa santike saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ atthāya saṭṭhimattāni pariveṇāni kārāpetvā dvāraṭṭālakapākārehi
anya-e1205n0:341_1: sobhitaṃ vihāraṃ niṭṭhapetvā attano deviyā ekanāmaṃ katvā mahindattherassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā gandhamālādhūpadhajehi
anya-e1205n0:341_2: pūjaṃ karonto divasassa tikkhattuṃ dhātupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dānādīni puññāni kurumāno giriabhayarājā mahantaṃ
anya-e1205n0:343_0: Deviyā saha modanto rajjaṃ kāresi nāyako.)
anya-e1205n0:344_0: Tato vihāradeviyā bhātā cullapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero nāma ekadivasaṃ kākavaṇṇatissamahārañño āyusaṅkhāramolokento
anya-e1205n0:344_1: na cirappavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā punadivase rañño santikaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ kathesi.
anya-e1205n0:344_2: Mahārāja tumhākaṃ nalāṭadhātuyā satthārā byākaraṇaṃ dinnaṃ;’mahāvālukagaṅgāya dakkhiṇabhāge seru nāma
anya-e1205n0:344_3: dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake anāgate kākavaṇṇatisso nāma mahārājā mayhaṃ nalāṭadhātuṃ patiṭṭhapessatī’ti
anya-e1205n0:344_4: vatvā taṃ sandhāya bhagavā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā gato.
anya-e1205n0:344_6: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā amhākaṃ kusalasampattiṃ avināsetvā ayyassa vacanamuddissa cetiyaṃ kārāpanatthāya gantabbanti
anya-e1205n0:344_7: mantvā bhaddakaṃ ayyā’ti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attano puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ girinagarato pakkosāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:344_9: ahaṃ mahāvālukāya gaṅgāya samīpe seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake cetiyaṃ kārāpanatthāya gamissāmi,
anya-e1205n0:344_10: sabbaseniyo ca mahā jano ca mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantu’ti vatvā rājā culapiṇḍapātiyatissattherassa tissamahāvihāre
anya-e1205n0:344_11: sāgalattherassa ca santikaṃ gantvā bhante tumhākaṃ parivāre pañcasatamatte bhikkhu gahetvā dhātuṃ upaṭṭhahantā
anya-e1205n0:344_12: mayā saddhiṃyeva āgacchathā’ti vatvā bhaddamāse bhaddadivase sunakkhatte sumuhutte bandhāvāraṃ sajjetvā
anya-e1205n0:344_13: dhātugharato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ nīharitvā susajjitarathe ṭhapetvā upari setacchattañca katvā purato purato
anya-e1205n0:345_0: Tato rājā puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ pakkosāpetvā anusāsitvā puttaṃ saddhātissakumārañca vihāradeviñca gahetvā sīghaṃ nikkhami.
anya-e1205n0:345_1: Cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero ca attano parivāre pañcasatabhikkhū gahetvā dhātuṃ upaṭṭhahanto pacchato āgañchi.
anya-e1205n0:345_2: Sabbaseniyo ca rājā ca bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhiṃ gantvā dīghavāpiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:345_3: Tasmiṃ saddhātissakumāraṃ nisīdāpetvā anukkamena āgantvā sumanamālāpiṭṭhiyaṃ khandhavāraṃ bandhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:345_4: Kasmā pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ evaṃ nāmakaṃ jātanti.
anya-e1205n0:345_5: Sumananāgarājā sattadivasāni nāgasampattiṃ abhiramamāno (nalāṭadhātuṃ vissari.) Sattāhaccayena nalāṭadhātuṃ
anya-e1205n0:345_6: anussaritvā pacchā āvajjamāno rañño dhātuṃ gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahantaṃ somanassaṃ patto mahantajjhāsayo
anya-e1205n0:345_7: attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā dhātupaṭipathaṃ gantvā dhātupatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāneva pathaviyaṃ nābhippamāṇato
anya-e1205n0:345_10: Punadivase rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā varāha nāma soṇḍiṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1205n0:345_11: Sampattāya dhātuyā tasmiṃ ṭhāne sumananāgarājā rathacakke yāva nābhiṃ tāva osīdāpetvā aparivattanaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:345_12: Taṃ disvā rājā saṃvegappatto theraṃ pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:346_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā dhātupatiṭṭhāna bhūmibhāgaṃ bhavissatī’ti cintetvā tattheva senaṃnivesetvā idaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1205n0:346_1: samantato sakaṇṭakaṃ vanaṃ nīharāpetvā bhūmibhāgaṃ atiramaṇīyaṃ bheritalamiva samaṃ kārāpetvā seniyapāmokkhaṃ
anya-e1205n0:346_2: āmantetvā tumhe dhātuṃ ṭhapanatthāya paṭhamaṃ dhātugharaṃ kārāpetvā dhātu gabbhaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā nivedesi.
anya-e1205n0:346_3: Rājā anto dhātughare tasmiṃ dhātugabbhe dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā bahi ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya tattha
anya-e1205n0:346_4: mahantaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ kārāpetvā dhātugharaṃ catujātiyagandhena vilimpāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:346_5: Tadupādāya taṃ gehaṃ gandhamūlaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:346_7: Tattha mahindo nāma thero āgantuka bhikkhūnaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:346_8: Punadivase rājā vihāraṃ gantvā sukhena vasittha ayyā’ti pucchitvā sabbe bhikkhu nimantetvā rājagehe nisīdāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:346_9: yāgubhattaṃ sakkaccaṃ datvā pacchā bhattaṃ anumodanaṃ sutvā nisinnakāle thero ovadanto mahārāja,
anya-e1205n0:346_10: pamādena vasituṃ na vaṭṭati jīvitaṃ nāma na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
anya-e1205n0:346_11: dhātupatiṭṭhāpanaṃ papañcaṃ akatvā kārehī’ti vatvā gāthamāha?
anya-e1205n0:347_0: Yasmā hi jīvitaṃ nāma appaṃ bubbulakupamaṃ;
anya-e1205n0:348_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso kareyya kusalaṃ sadā’ti.
anya-e1205n0:349_0: Iminā nayena dhammaṃ kathetvā cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissa tthero ca sāgalatthero ca mahindatthero cā’ti tayo
anya-e1205n0:349_1: therā attano attano parivāre bhikkhū gahetvā dhātu pariharaṇatthāya āgacchiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:358_0: Tato vimaṃsetvā bhumibhāgaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti bhūmi bhāgaṃ vīmaṃsento maṅgalasammate aṭṭha goṇe āharāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:358_1: gandhodakena nahāpetvā siṅgesu suvaṇṇakañcukaṃ patimuñcāpetvā gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ dāpetvā gīvāya mālādāmaṃ
anya-e1205n0:358_3: Yadi pana bhagavato nalāṭadhātu yasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhahitvā lokatthacariyaṃ karontī pañcavassasahassāni
anya-e1205n0:358_4: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissati tasmiṃ ṭhāne goṇā sayameva ayodāmato muñcitvā thupaṭṭhānaṃ samantato vicaritvā
anya-e1205n0:358_5: catusu disāsu sayantuti adhiṭṭhahitvā purise āṇāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:358_7: Tato vibhātāya rattiyā rājāgoṇe gāhāpanatthāya āyuttake āṇāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:358_8: Te manussā gantvā goṇe apassitvā na passāma devā’ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:358_11: Te gavesamānā bandhanaṭṭhāne adisvā padānupadaṃ gantvā thūpakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ samantā vicaritvā catusu disāsu
anya-e1205n0:358_12: sayitagoṇe disvā sayitaṭṭhānato naṅguṭṭhādīni maddantāpi uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ;  deva,
anya-e1205n0:358_14: ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ samantā vicaritvā catusu disāsu sayitā’ti.
anya-e1205n0:358_15: Taṃ sutvā rājā senaṅgaparivuto sayameva gantvā’pi goṇe uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto rājā evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi;
anya-e1205n0:358_16: yadi imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātu patiṭṭhāpetabbā bhaveyya goṇā uṭṭhahitvā gacchantu’ti.
anya-e1205n0:358_18: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā pasannamano hutvā punekadivasaṃ vuttaniyāmeneva asse alaṅkārāpetvā ayodāmena bandhāpetvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:358_19: Assāpi te goṇā viya gantvā nipajjiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:358_20: Rājā gantvā tatheva adhiṭṭhahitvā asse uṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:358_22: Sopi bandhadāme chinditvā pacchimayāmasamanantare gantvā cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāne nipajji.
anya-e1205n0:358_23: Pabhātāya rattiyā rājā hatthīgopake pakkosāpetvā hatthiṃ ānethā’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:358_25: hatthiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne na passāma devā’ti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:358_27: sīghaṃ upadhārethā’ti vutte hatthigopakā padānupadaṃ gavesamānā cetiyaṭṭhāne nipannaṃ hatthiṃ disvā āgantvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:358_28: Taṃ sutvā rājā heṭṭhā vuttappakārena paṭipajjitvā hatthiṃ pure katvā āgacchi.
anya-e1205n0:359_0: Evaṃ tīhi vimaṃsanāhi vīmaṃsetvā bhumigahitabhāvaṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā upaṭṭhahamāno ārocesi.
anya-e1205n0:359_1: Tasmiṃ kāle serunagare sivarājā bahū paṇṇākāre gāhāpetvā rājānaṃ passissāmi’ti āgantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:359_2: Rājā tena saddhiṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ katvā nisinnakāle loṇanagare mahānāgarājā’pi bahupaṇṇākāraṃ gāhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:359_3: rājānaṃ passissāmi’ti āgantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:359_6: tumhe mama sahāyā hothā’ti te gahetvā gantvā dhātuṃ vandathā’ti vandāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:359_8: Devā sādhukāraṃ karontā ākāsato mālāyo khipiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:359_9: Rājāno somanassappattā amhākaṃ laṅkāyaṃ dasabalassa nalāṭadhātu amhākaṃ raṭṭhe patiṭṭhahissati.
anya-e1205n0:359_10: Esā dhātu mahā janassa satthukiccaṃ sādheyyāti vanditvā gatā.
anya-e1205n0:359_11: Rājā tesaṃ gatakāle giriabhayaṃ pakkosāpetvā tāta,
anya-e1205n0:359_12: iṭṭhakaṃ janassa pīḷanaṃ akatvā kārāpemā’tī āha.
anya-e1205n0:359_16: Amhākaṃ santike suvaṇṇarajatāni mandāni kuto labhissāmā’ti vutte giriabhayo evamāha; deva,
anya-e1205n0:360_0: So tassa taṃ acintanīyaṃ kathaṃ sutvā somanassappatto therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā dhātuṃ vanditvā
anya-e1205n0:360_1: nagaraṃ gantvā bhuttasāyamāso sayane nipanno niddaṃ okkami.
anya-e1205n0:360_2: Vibhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā iṭṭhakaṃ cintayamānassa domanassaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:360_3: Tasmiṃ kāle sakko devarājā vissakammaṃ devaputtaṃ āmantetvā; tāta,
anya-e1205n0:360_5: kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā amhākaṃ satthuno nalāṭa dhātuṃ nidahitvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ kārāpetukāmo iṭṭhakaṃ cintayi.
anya-e1205n0:360_6: Tvaṃ gantvā phāsukaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakaṃ māpehīti āha.
anya-e1205n0:360_7: Taṃ sutvā vissakammadevaputto duggatassa brāhmaṇassa khette iṭṭhakaṃ māpetvā devalokameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:360_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe khettasāmiko duggatabrāhmaṇo pātova attano khettaṃ olokanatthāya gato itovito olokento iṭṭhakarāsiṃ disvā cintesi;
anya-e1205n0:360_9: hīyo rājā iṭṭhakaṃ kathaṃ labhissāmīti kathesi.
anya-e1205n0:360_10: Mahantaṃ vata paṇṇākāraṃ mayā laddhanti tuṭṭho devैṭṭhakāni kājena gahetvā rañño dassanatthāya gantvā rājadvāre ṭhatvā sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
anya-e1205n0:360_11: Taṃ pakkosāpetvā kasmā pāto’va āgatosī’ti pucchi.
anya-e1205n0:360_12: Deva mayhaṃ khette iṭṭhakarāsiṃ disvā pāto’va iṭṭhakāni gahetvā āgatomhī’ti.
anya-e1205n0:360_14: Rājā passitvā somanassappatto brāhmaṇassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:361_1: Madanapaṭṭanadvārato catasso rajatanāvā suvaṇṇabhumito catasso suvaṇṇanāvā ukkamiṃsūti paṭṭanamukhadvāre
anya-e1205n0:361_2: viharanto ārakkhaka jeṭṭhako dhammapālo nāma āgantvā rañño ārocesi.
anya-e1205n0:363_0: Āharitvāna taṃ sabbaṃ kammaṃ ārabhi cetiye.
anya-e1205n0:366_2: Thero sutvā tuṭṭho attano parivārehi pañcasatabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ iṭṭhaka bhūmiṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:366_3: Tato mahāsāgalatthero ca mahindatthero ca attano parivārehi bhikkhuhi saddhiṃ iṭṭhakabhumiṃ gatā.
anya-e1205n0:366_6: Somanagare giriabhayarājāpi attano senaṅgehi parivāretvā iṭṭhakabhumiṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:366_7: Tesaṃ samaṇa brāhmaṇānaṃ rājabaḷānañca sampiṇḍitattā so piṭṭhipāsāṇo balavāhano nāma jāto.
anya-e1205n0:366_9: Thero iṭṭhakarāsiṃ oloketvā rājānaṃ evamāha? Mahārāja,
anya-e1205n0:366_11: Rājā attamano senaṅgaparivuto sayameva paṭhamaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:366_12: Taṃ disvā sesarājāno ca amaccādayo ca parisā ca sabbe bhikkhu ca iṭṭhakāni gaṇhiṃsu tasmiṃ kāle bhāraṃ
anya-e1205n0:366_13: ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ papañcaṃ bhavissatī’ti rājā cintesi.
anya-e1205n0:366_17: Pacchā devanāgādayo iṭṭhakabhumito paṭṭhāya yāva cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ nirantarā ṭhitā āharissantī’ti.
anya-e1205n0:366_19: Teneva nīyāmena yāva cetiyassa niṭṭhaṅgamā tāva devanāgasupaṇṇādayo nirantaraṃ ṭhatvā iṭṭhakāni āharitvā
anya-e1205n0:367_0: Tato rājā sabbe iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī rāsiṃ kārāpetvā tesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ antare jayasenaṃ nāma iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakiṃ
anya-e1205n0:367_1: parigaṇhitvā tassa pana satasahassagghanakāni dve sāṭakāni kahāpaṇasatasahassāni ca suvaṇṇakuṇḍalādayo
anya-e1205n0:367_3: Tassa parivārānaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ ahatavatthādīni sabbupakaraṇāni dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:367_4: Anekavidhaṃ mahantaṃ sammānaṃ kāretvā therena saddhiṃ mantento;
anya-e1205n0:367_6: tasmā nalāṭadhātuyā maṅgalaṃ karitvā cetiyaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:367_9: buddhassa bhagavato jātadivaso’ti vatvā cetiyakammakaraṇatthāya pañca jane gaṇhi.
anya-e1205n0:367_15: Imesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ maṅgalaṃ kārāpetvā chaṇavesaṃ gahetvā sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkārāpetvā rājā sayampi sabbālaṅkārena
anya-e1205n0:367_16: patimaṇḍito maṅgalavidhānaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
anya-e1205n0:367_17: catusu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā vijamhetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ maṇimuttāratanamayaṃ
anya-e1205n0:367_19: gāhāpetvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ tattha karonto sayampi paribbhamanadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā parikammakatabhumiyaṃ paribbhamitvā
anya-e1205n0:367_21: Tato mahāvaḍḍhakī sunakkhattena sumuhuttena cetiyaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:368_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe catunahutādhika dviyojana satasahassabahulā ayaṃ mahāpathavī sādhukāraṃ pavattentī viya mahānādaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e1205n0:368_2: mattikaṃ nisadena piṃsitvā suppehi papphoṭhetvā denti.
anya-e1205n0:368_3: Evaṃ karonto katipayeneva divasena pupphādhānattayaṃ cinitvā mahābhikkhu saṅghassa nivedesi.
anya-e1205n0:368_4: Taṃ sutvā saṅgho cunduttaranāmake dve sāmaṇere āṇāpesi?
anya-e1205n0:368_6: Te pana sāmaṇerā jātiyā soḷasavassikā chaḷabhiññāppabhedena paṭisambhidappattā.
anya-e1205n0:368_7: Mahākhīṇāsavabhikkhusaṅghassa santikā bhikkhusaṅghassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavantato
anya-e1205n0:368_9: Etesu ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ dhātugabbhassa bhumiyaṃ pattharitvā catusu passesu cattāro pāsāṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā aparaṃ
anya-e1205n0:369_0: Tadā rājā dhātugabbhe kammaṃ niṭṭhapento nava koṭippamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpetvā suvaṇṇakārānaṃ datvā dhātugabbhassa iṭṭhakāni karothā’ti āṇāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:369_1: Te suvaṇṇakārā dīghato ratanappamāṇaṃ puthulato vidatthīppamāṇaṃ bahalato caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ katvā dhātugabbhaṃ ciniṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:369_2: Taṃ pana dhātugabbhaṃ uccato soḷasahatthaṃ vitthāratopi itocito dasadasaratanaṃ katvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakeheva
anya-e1205n0:369_3: niṭṭhapetvā dhātugabbhassa majjhe sattaratanamayaṃ sineruṃ kārāpetvā sinerussa upari jātihiṅgulakena
anya-e1205n0:369_4: paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ sattaratanena pāricchattakarukkhaṃ rajatamayaṃ setacchattaṃ brahmunā gāhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:369_25: Sinerussa majjhimabhāge tārāgaṇaparivāritaṃ rajatamayaṃ candamaṇḍalañca kārāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:370_0: Tato sinerussa matthake pāricchattakamule paṇḍukambalasilāsane amhākaṃ satthuno paṭimaṃ ghanakoṭṭima
anya-e1205n0:370_1: rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ kārāpetvā mātudevapāmokkha dasasahassa cakkavāḷadevatānaṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ
anya-e1205n0:370_4: Aṅguliyo suvaṇṇamayā hatthapādatalāni ca dantāvaraṇāni ca akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhānāni ca jātipavāḷamayāni,
anya-e1205n0:370_7: Uṇṇalomaṃ pana suvaṇṇa bhittiyaṃ ṭhapitarajatabubbuḷavilāsaṃ rajatamayaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:370_8: Bhagavato anavalokita muddhani matthake sattaratanamayaṃ vicittakiṃkiṇijālaṃ parikkhipāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:370_9: Maṇḍapassa anto navasatasahassagghanakaṃ muttākalāpamolambakaṃ manoramaṃ celavitānaṃ bandhāpetvā maṇḍapakoṭiyaṃ
anya-e1205n0:370_10: muttājālaṃ tadanantaraṃ satta ratanavicittaṃ kiṃkiṇijālaṃ parikkhipāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:371_1: Tathā erāvaṇavissakammadevaputtādayo ca saparivāro sakko devarājā ca cattāro mahārājāno ca pañcasikhadevaputtādayo
anya-e1205n0:371_2: gandhabbadevaputtā ca sahampati mahā brahmādayo mahābrahmano ca kārāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:371_3: Vessantarajātakaṃ karonto saṃjayamahārājā phusatīdevī ādayo ca maddīdevī dve dārake ca jūjakabrāhmaṇādayo ca kārāpesi. Vidhura-
anya-e1205n0:371_9: suddhodanamahārājā mahāmāyā mahāpajāpatī gotamī bhaddakaccānā rāhulamātādevī ca rāhulakumāro ca channañca
anya-e1205n0:371_10: kanthakañca mahābhinikkhamanaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍalaṃ asītimahāsāvakā kosalamahārājā anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhi
anya-e1205n0:371_12: visākhā suppavāsā ca pacchā cūḷapiṇḍapātiya tissattherañca attānañca kārāpetvā te sabbe dhātu gabbhe patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:373_0: Evaṃ dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhānaṃ suvibhattaṃ sumanoramaṃ kārāpetvā therena saddhiṃ kathesi?
anya-e1205n0:373_6: kesadhātuyo vicinitvā āharāpessāmāti vatvā attano saddhivihārikaṃ sivattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā āvuso bhūmindharanāgavimāne jayaseno nāma nāgarājā vasati.
anya-e1205n0:373_7: Tassa santike (kesadhātuyo santi.) Tapussa bhallikānaṃ dvebhātikavāṇijānaṃ paricaraṇakāle tesaṃ pamādaṃ
anya-e1205n0:373_8: ñatvā nāgarājā dve kesadhātuyo gahetvā nāgabhavane ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:373_9: Tvaṃ tā dhātuyo āharitvā rañño dehīti āṇāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:374_0: Tato rājā attano bhaginiyā somadeviyā ca bhāgineyyassa giriabhayarañño ca sāsanaṃ pesesi?
anya-e1205n0:374_3: Loṇanagare mahānāgarañño ca seru nagare sivarañño ca tatheva sāsanaṃ pesetvā sayampi attano vijite yena
anya-e1205n0:374_4: mayhaṃ hatthato antamaso ekakarīsamattampi laddhaṃ tadupādāya sabbepi tumhe saddhiṃ parivārena āgacchathā’ti
anya-e1205n0:374_6: Taṃ sutvā somanassappattā mahājanā attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkatapaṭiyattā agamiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:374_7: Rājā pabhātāya rattiyā sabbe seniyo gandhamālādhūpadhajādayo gahetvā dhātunidhānaṃ āgacchantuti vatvā
anya-e1205n0:374_8: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tivīvaratthāya mahagghavatthādīni datvā sayampi sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍito
anya-e1205n0:374_9: nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya maṇikuṇḍalamekhalānūpura valayādivicittasabbālaṅkāravibhūsitāhi
anya-e1205n0:374_11: parivārito vuttappakārehi saddhiṃ cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:375_0: Tato somanagare giriabhayarājā’pi sabbe nāgarā attano attano vibhavānurūpena dhātunidhānaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantuti
anya-e1205n0:375_1: nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍito susajjitaamaccagaṇaparivārito nikkhami.
anya-e1205n0:375_2: Soma devīpi sīsaṃ nahātvā ahatavatthanivatthā sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍitā devaccharā viya attano parivārā
anya-e1205n0:375_3: pañcasatakumāriyo nīlavatthehi paridahāpetvā tatheva alaṅkāretvā puṇṇaghaṭe gāhāpetvā tāsaṃ anantarā
anya-e1205n0:375_4: pañcasatakumāriyo pītavatthehi paridahāpetvā tatheva alaṅkāretvā pūjābhaṇḍāni gāhāpetvā,
anya-e1205n0:375_5: tāsaṃ anantarā pañcasata kumāriyo rattavatthehi paridahāpetvā tatheva.
anya-e1205n0:375_6: Alaṅkāretvā vicitrapupphapūritamañjusāyo gāhāpetvā tāsaṃ anantarā pañcasatakumāriyo setavatthehi paridahāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:375_7: tatheva alaṅkāretvā dhūma kaṭacchuke gāhāpetvā evaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ saṃvidahitvā parivārena cetiṅgaṇaṃ gantvā
anya-e1205n0:375_8: mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā attano sāminā giriabhayarājena
anya-e1205n0:376_0: Loṇanagare mahānāgarājā’pi sabbālaṅkārehi patimaṇḍito sabbābharaṇehi susajjītaamaccamaṇḍalaparivuto naccagītaturīyāni
anya-e1205n0:376_1: paggaṇhāpayamāno gandhamālā dhūmakaṭacchu gāhāpetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:377_0: Serunagare sivarājā’pi attānaṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā mahantena parivārena pūjāvidhānaṃ gāhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:377_1: cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:377_2: Rājaparisā attano vibhavānurūpena vatthālaṅkārehi candana mālādīhi ca sobhamānā nalāṭe muttākalāpamolambaka
anya-e1205n0:377_3: vicittasuvaṇṇapaṭṭāni bandhitvā hatthābharaṇādi anekābharaṇehi dibbaparisā viya sumaṇḍitapasādhitā vesānurūpāni
anya-e1205n0:377_5: Sīhavyagghadīpicammehi pasādhitasuvaṇṇālaṅkārasuvaṇṇadhajahemajālasañchanne ratha vare ca sabbālaṅkāravibhusitā rathikā āruyha ekapasse ṭhītā.
anya-e1205n0:377_6: Brāhmaṇaputtādayo maṇḍitacamme pārupitvā upasobhayamānā ekapasse ṭhītā.
anya-e1205n0:377_7: Bahu amaccā attano attano vesānurūpena mahagghavatthābharaṇavibhūsitā saparivārā ekapasse ṭhītā.
anya-e1205n0:377_8: Gandhodaka pūrita dakkhiṇāvatta saṅkhaṃ gahetvā upavītasuttaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā brāhmaṇaveṭhanaṃ veṭhetvā
anya-e1205n0:377_9: purohitabrāhmaṇā mahantena parivārena pūjāvidhānaṃ gāhāpetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ
anya-e1205n0:378_0: Khemaṃ subhikkhaṃ bhavatu niccaṃ janapadaṃ sivaṃ;
anya-e1205n0:379_0: Sassāni samuppajjantu rañño evaṃ jayā siyuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:380_1: Samuddapariyantaṃ hi mahiṃ sāgarakuṇḍalaṃ vasundharaṃ āvasatu amaccaparivārito.
anya-e1205n0:380_3: Amhākaṃ ayyo kākavaṇṇatisso mahā rājā sadevake loke ekapuggalassa lokanāthassanalāṭadhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpetī’ti
anya-e1205n0:380_5: Khujjavāmanakādayo’pi sabbe janā pūjābhaṇḍāni gahetvā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:380_6: Imasmiṃ cetiyaṭṭhāne rāsībhūtā parisā evaṃ veditabbā?
anya-e1205n0:380_7: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā negamā ca samāgatā pupphādigahitā sabbe alaṅkāravibhūsitā.
anya-e1205n0:381_0: Gaṇanā vītivattā te aneke ca mahājanā;
anya-e1205n0:387_0: Tato cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero attano saddhivihārīke pañcasata khīṇāsave parivāretvā cetiyaṭṭhānameva āgato.
anya-e1205n0:387_1: Mahāsāgalatthero’pi pañcasata khīṇāsave parivāretvā cetiyaṭṭhānameva āgato.
anya-e1205n0:387_2: Mahindatthero’pi attano sāvake saṭṭhimatte khiṇāsave gahetvā cetiyaṭṭhānameva āgato.
anya-e1205n0:387_3: Iti iminā niyāmeneva eko dve tayo cattāro pañca khīṇāsavā āgacchantā satta sahassamattā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:387_4: Tato cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero ettake bhikkhū parivāretvā cetiyaṅgaṇe nisīdī.
anya-e1205n0:387_5: Tato rājā āgantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā therena saddhiṃ kathesi?
anya-e1205n0:387_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tissatthero attano saddhivihārikaṃ sivattheraṃ olokesi.
anya-e1205n0:387_8: So olokitakkhaṇeyeva nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā chaḷabhiñño
anya-e1205n0:387_9: mahākhīṇāsavo catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā bhumindharanāgavimāne
anya-e1205n0:390_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye jayaseno nāgarājā attano bhāgineyyaṃ dvikoṭimatte nāge parivāretvā mahā yasaṃ
anya-e1205n0:390_1: anubhavamānaṃ nisinnaṃ iṅgitasaññaṃ datvā theraṃ duratova āgacchantaṃ disvā cintesi?
anya-e1205n0:390_3: Nissaṃsayaṃ kesadhātuṃ nissāya āgato bhavissatīti uṭṭhāya dhātugharaṃ pavisitvā dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ gilitvā kiñci ajānanto viya nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:390_4: Tasmiṃ kāle thero tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1205n0:390_5: Nāgarājā paccuggantvā paṭisanthāraṃ karonto therena saddhiṃ kathesi.
anya-e1205n0:390_7: Tilokanāthassa amhākaṃ sambuddhassa kesadhātūnaṃ atthāya āgato,
anya-e1205n0:390_8: tuyhaṃ santike ṭhapitakesadhātuyo papañcaṃ akatvā mayhaṃ dehi,
anya-e1205n0:390_9: teyeva sandhāya upajjhāyena pesitomhī’ti vutte amhākaṃ sammā sambuddhassa kesadhātuyo mama santike natthī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:390_10: Thero dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ gilitabhāvaṃ ñatvā gaṇhāmi mahārājā kesadhātuyo’ti vutte āma passanto gahetvā gacchāhīti āha.
anya-e1205n0:390_11: Evaṃ tayo vāre paṭiññaṃ gahetvā tatheva ṭhīto?
anya-e1205n0:391_0: Iddhiyā māpayitvāna tato so sukhumaṃ karaṃ,
anya-e1205n0:394_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jayaseno nāgarājā samaṇaṃ vañcetvā pesitomhī’ti vatvā tassa gatakāle dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ oloketvā
anya-e1205n0:394_1: dhātu apassitvā samaṇena nāsitomhī’ti dve hatthe ukkhipitvā ṭhapetvā attano sakalanāgabhavanaṃ eka kolāhalaṃ
anya-e1205n0:394_3: Amhākaṃ cakkhuni uppāṭetvā gato viya sadevakassa lokassa patiṭṭhānabhūtassa sammāsambuddhassa kesadhātuyo
anya-e1205n0:394_4: apāyadukkhato amuñcantānaṃ amhākaṃ abhibhavitvā dhātuyo gahetvā gatasamaṇaṃ anubandhitvā gaṇhissāmā’ti
anya-e1205n0:394_5: dvekoṭimatte nāge gahetvā attano bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ tassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhitvā ākāsaṃ uggacchiṃ (su).
anya-e1205n0:394_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pana sivatthero akāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1205n0:394_8: Evaṃ thero tehi saddhiṃ ummujja nimujjaṃ karonto pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā serunagarassa nātidūre piṭṭhipāsāṇe uggañji.
anya-e1205n0:394_9: Tattheva te saṃvejetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe mahābhikkhusaṅghassa purato pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:394_10: Nāgā taṃ gahetuṃ asakkontā mahantena saddena ravaṃ patiravaṃ datvā.
anya-e1205n0:394_11: Ito paṭṭhāya naṭṭhamhā’ti tasmiṃ piṭṭhi pāsāṇe sabbe samāgamaṃ katvā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu?
anya-e1205n0:394_13: Tato paṭṭhāya so piṭṭhipāsāṇo nāgānaṃ ravaṃ patiravaṃ datvā paridevitahāvena nāgagallaṃ nāma ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:395_0: Nāgo therassa piṭṭhitoyeva anubandhitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ evamāha? Deva,
anya-e1205n0:395_1: eso bhikkhu mayā adinnadhātu gahetvā āgato’ti.
anya-e1205n0:395_3: Saccaṃ kira ayya nāgassa vacananti vutte naheva mahārāja,
anya-e1205n0:395_4: iminā dinnaṃ eva dhātuṃ aggahesinti vutte?
anya-e1205n0:395_6: Thero tassa bhāginyeṃ samaṇuppala nāgarājānaṃ sakkhiṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:395_7: Rājā tassa bhāgineyyassa sabbavacanaṃ sutvā saddahi.
anya-e1205n0:395_8: Tasmiṃ kāle dukkhābhibhūto nāgarājā gantvā bahi ṭhīto.
anya-e1205n0:395_9: Tato paṭṭhāya so nāgarājā bahi hutvā nisinnattā bahināgarājā nāma ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:395_10: Tassa pana bhāgineyyaṃ anto cetiyaṅgaṇe nisīdāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:395_11: Imassa pana cetiyassa ārakkhaṃ gahitanāgā kathetabbā.
anya-e1205n0:395_16: Rājā therassa hatthato kesadhātuṃ gahetvā ratanacaṅegāṭake ṭhapetvā mahindassa nāma amaccassa adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:395_17: Tasmiṃ samāgame tipiṭakamahāphussadevattherassa saddhivihārikā paṭisambhidappattā cattāro sāmaṇerā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:395_18: Tesu eko malaya rājaputto sumanasāmaṇero nāma,
anya-e1205n0:395_19: eko serunagare sivarājabhāgineyyassa putto uttara sāmaṇero nāma.
anya-e1205n0:395_20: Eko mahāgāme mālākāraputto cunda sāmaṇero nāma eko mahāgāme ekassa kuṭumbikassa putto mahākassapasāmaṇero nāma,
anya-e1205n0:395_21: ime cattāro sāmaṇerā ajja kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā mahācetiye dhātu nidhānaṃ karissati,
anya-e1205n0:395_22: mayaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā sukusumāni āharissāmāti theraṃ vanditvā ākāsato himavantaṃ gantvā campakanāgasalalādayo
anya-e1205n0:396_0: Tasmiṃ kāle sakko devarājā sabbābharaṇapatimaṇḍito dvisu devalokesu devatāyo gahetvā erāvaṇahatthīkkhandhamāruyha
anya-e1205n0:396_1: aḍḍhateyyakoṭidevaccharāparivārito sudassanamahā vīthiyaṃ vicaranto savaṅgoṭake te cattāro sāmaṇere duratova
anya-e1205n0:396_2: āgacchante disvā hatthīkkhandhato oruyha pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā tesaṃ hatthe mālācaṅgoṭake disvā?
anya-e1205n0:396_6: Laṅkāyaṃ kākavaṇṇatissa mahārājā dasabalassa nalāṭadhātuṃ gahetvā mahāvālukagaṅagāya dakkhiṇapasse seru
anya-e1205n0:396_7: nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake cetiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ tumhākaṃ niyogena vissakammadevaputtena
anya-e1205n0:396_8: nimmitैṭṭhakāni gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā ajja dhātunidhānaṃ karoti.
anya-e1205n0:396_9: Tattha pūjanatthāya himavantato ānītapupphamidanti vatvā itopi kusumaṃ gahetuṃ āgatamhā’ti vadiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:397_0: Ayya tumhākaṃ hatthe pupphāni cūḷāmaṇicetiye pujetvā amhākaṃ uyyānato pupphāni gahetvā gacchathāti vatvā
anya-e1205n0:397_1: tehi saddhiṃ gantvā tesaṃ pupphehi cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ pūjesi.
anya-e1205n0:397_2: Tato papañcaṃ na bhavitabbanti sakkassa nivedesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:397_3: Taṃ sutvā sakko sāmaṇerānaṃ pañcamahāuyyānato pāricchatta-
anya-e1205n0:397_4: koviḷārādīni pupphāni ca candanacuṇṇañca gahetvā dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:397_5: Sāmaṇerā pupphāni gahetvā devalokato otaritvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇamaṇipabbate santacchāyāya nasīditvā
anya-e1205n0:397_6: divāvihāraṃ katvā nakkhattavelāya sampattāya maṇī gavesamānā cattāro maṇayo addasaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:397_11: cattāro maṇayo ca dibbapupphāni ca gahetvā therānaṃ dassesuṃ. Thero? Mahārāja,
anya-e1205n0:397_12: ime sāmaṇerā pāricchattakakoviḷārādīni pupphāni ca candanacuṇṇañca cattāro maṇayo ca gahetvā āgatā’ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:398_0: Rājā taṃ sutvā somanassajāto sāmaṇere pañca patiṭṭhītena vanditvā tesamāhatamaṇayo gahetvā mahānanda
anya-e1205n0:398_1: nāma amaccassa datvā therehī saddhiṃ mahantena parivārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā maṇikaraṇḍakena dhātuṃ
anya-e1205n0:398_2: gahetvā attano sīse dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā upari setacchattaṃ kārāpetvā cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
anya-e1205n0:398_4: Ayaṃ dasabalassa nalāṭadhātu amhehi kārāpitāya buddhapaṭimāya nalāṭe uṇṇalomākāraṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahatūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1205n0:398_5: Tassa cintitakkhaṇeyeva dhātu karaṇḍato nabhamuggantvā ākāse sattatālappamāṇe ṭhatvā chabbaṇṇa raṃsiyo vissajjesi.
anya-e1205n0:398_6: Tā raṃsiyo kuṭena āsiñcamānavilīna suvaṇṇaṃ viya antalikkhato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ raṃsijālehi ekobhāsaṃ katvā gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:398_8: Mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājanā tathāgatassa rūpakāyaṃ paccakkhabhutā viya ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:403_0: Tasmiṃ samāgame eko paṇḍitapuriso jinaṃ thomento evamāha?
anya-e1205n0:407_0: Kareyya ñatvā puññaṃ taṃ patthento bodhimuttamaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:408_0: Tasmiṃ kāle nānāratanavicittaṃ anekālaṅkārapatimaṇḍitaṃ mahārahaṃ samussitadhajapatākaṃ nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇaṃ
anya-e1205n0:408_5: Evaṃ sabbe devā nāgā manussā sādhukāraṃ denti,
anya-e1205n0:408_17: Mahantena sādhukārena mahā nigghosena sakalalaṅkādīpe tibbavātābhihatasamuddo viya ekaninnādaṃ ekanigghosaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:408_18: Iminā pūjāvidhānena pasādakabhūtamahājanakāyamajjhe dhātu pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā ākāsato otaritvā buddhapaṭimāya
anya-e1205n0:409_0: Rājā mahānandanāmakassa amaccassa hatthato kesadhātuṃ gahetvā vihāradeviyā datvā tvaṃ imā kesadhātuyo
anya-e1205n0:409_2: Sā kesadhātuyo gahetvā tattheva patiṭṭhahantu’ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:409_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kesadhātuyo karaṇḍato nabhaṃ uggantvā mayūragīvasaṃkāsanīlaraṃsiyo vissajjentī ākāsato otaritvā
anya-e1205n0:410_0: Tato rājā therena saddhiṃ dhātugabbhaṃ pavisitvā dibbacandanacuṇṇasamākiṇṇaṃ pāricchattakakoviḷārādi
anya-e1205n0:410_1: sugandhapupphasantharaṃ viyūhitvā pabhāsamudayasamākiṇṇe cattāro maṇi pāsāṇe ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:410_3: Sabbanāṭakitthīyo attano attano ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā dhātugabbheyeva pūjesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:410_4: Tato rājā dhātunidhānaṃ katvā buddharūpassa pādatale sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā nipanno evaṃ paridevi;
anya-e1205n0:410_5: mayhaṃ pitupitāmahaparamparāgatādhātu ajja ādiṃ katvā ito paṭṭhāya viyogā jātā ahaṃ dāni tumhākaṃ aticiraṃ
anya-e1205n0:410_6: (ṭhītā) ramaṇīyā rohaṇajanapadā āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpesinti vatvā sineru muddhani samujjalamahāpadīpo
anya-e1205n0:410_8: Idāni na gamissāma mayaṃ khamatha bhagavā’ti paridevamāno dhātu gabbheyeva patitvā āha?
anya-e1205n0:411_0: Aho viyogaṃ dukkhaṃ me etā bādhenti dhātuyo;
anya-e1205n0:412_0: Vatvā so paridevanto dhātugabbhe sayī tadā.
anya-e1205n0:413_0: Marissāmi no gamissaṃ ayyaṃ hitvā idheva’haṃ;
anya-e1205n0:414_0: Dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ tassa saṃsāre carato mamā’ti.
anya-e1205n0:415_1: Tassa pana bhikkhusaṅghassa antare sahadevo nāma thero rājānaṃ dhātugabbhe rodamānaṃ nipannaṃ disvā kimajjhāsayo
anya-e1205n0:415_2: etassā’ti cetopariyañāṇena samantāharitvā idha nipanno marissāmī’ti nipannabhāvaṃ jānitvā iddhiyā saṃsaraṃ
anya-e1205n0:415_3: piyarūpaṃ māpetvā dhātugabbhato taṃ bahi akāsi.
anya-e1205n0:417_0: Taṃ khaṇaññeva sappañño rājānaṃ taṃ bahiṃ akā.)
anya-e1205n0:418_0: Tato paṭhamānītajotiraṅga pāsāṇaṃ dhātugabbhassa upari vitānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā arahantā?
anya-e1205n0:418_1: Dhātugabbho samantato caturassamañcaṃ viya ekaghano hotu.
anya-e1205n0:418_6: paccatthikapaccāmittānaṃ okāso vā vivaro vā mā hotu’ti adhiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:418_7: Tato rājā dhātuyo mahantaṃ pūjaṃ katvā maṅgalacetiye caturassakoṭṭhakaṃ atimanoramaṃ chattakammañca kelāsakūṭaṃ
