anya-e1205n0:418_8: viya sudhākammañca vālukapādato paṭṭhāya sabbañca kattabbaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:418_9: So pana seta nimmalacandaraṃsi viya udakabubbuḷakelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgo chattadharo acalappatiṭṭhito sujanappasādako
anya-e1205n0:425_0: Bahū janā samāgamma nānā desā samāgatā;
anya-e1205n0:427_0: Īdiso patirūpavāso so deso dullabho bhave;
anya-e1205n0:428_0: Appamattā sadā santā vinātha kusalaṃ bahunti.
anya-e1205n0:429_1: sirivaḍḍhanaṃ nāma mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā tattha bodhigharañca kārāpetvā tibhūmakaṃ uposathāgāraṃ kārāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:429_2: rattiṭṭhāna divāṭṭhānādīni katvā sabbaṃ vihāre kattabbaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1205n0:429_3: Ettakaṃ kārāpetvā vihāraṃ dakkhiṇodakaṃ dassāmī’ti cintetvā asītisahassamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sattadivasāni
anya-e1205n0:429_4: nānāvidha sūpavyañjanehi mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase mahābhikkhu saṅghassa ticīvaratthāya vatthāni
anya-e1205n0:429_5: dāpetvā pātova pātarāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhīto evamāha? Ayyā,
anya-e1205n0:429_8: upakaṭṭha puṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase assayujanakkhattena dakkhiṇaṃ dhātuṃ bhaddakanti.
anya-e1205n0:429_9: So therassa vacanaṃ sutvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena theraṃ vanditvā somanagare attano bhaginiṃ deviṃ kathesi? Bhagini,
anya-e1205n0:429_10: dasabalassa nalāṭadhātuṃ nidahitvā maṅgalamahācetiyānurūpaṃ pāsādaṃ alaṅkatadvāraṭṭālakatoraṇaṃ seta
anya-e1205n0:429_11: vattha anekadhajasamākiṇṇaṃ vihārañca kārāpetvā dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī’ti ayyassa kathesiṃ.
anya-e1205n0:429_13: upakaṭṭha puṇṇamāya uposathadivase dātuṃ yuttanti āhā’ti. Deva,
anya-e1205n0:429_15: ayyassa kathītaniyāmeneva upakaṭṭha puṇṇamāya uposathadivase dakkhiṇaṃ dehī’ti āha.
anya-e1205n0:429_16: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā somanassapatto sādhu bhadde’ti sampaṭicchitvā somanagare viharanto,
anya-e1205n0:429_17: upakaṭṭha puṇṇamāya uposathe sampatteyeva ajjuposatho’ti ñatvā giriabhayaṃ pakkosāpetvā,
anya-e1205n0:429_18: tāta sve dakkhiṇaṃ dātabbaṃ tvaṃ senaṅgaṃ alaṅkaritvā sve amhehi saddhiṃ ehī’ti vatvā serunagare sivarañño loṇanagare mahānāgarañño paṇṇaṃ pahiṇī.
anya-e1205n0:429_19: Sve tumhākaṃ hatthiassarathapattādīni suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā sve amhehi saddhiṃ chaṇa vesaṃ gāhāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:429_21: Te pana rājāno sāsanaṃ sutvā attano attano vibhavānurūpena hatthiassarathapattādīni alaṅkaritvā gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ
anya-e1205n0:429_22: datvā suvaṇṇamālādīni pilandhāpetvā mahā goṇepi tatheva alaṅkaritvā siṅgesu suvaṇṇakañcukaṃ (paṭi) muñcāpetvā
anya-e1205n0:429_27: senāpatiādayo ca vicittavatthāni nivāsetvā nānāvidhavilepanāni vilimpetvā āgantvā rañño dassayiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:429_28: Rājāpi caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto alaṅkatahatthikkhandhaṃ āruhi.
anya-e1205n0:429_29: Sesarājāno ca attano attano senaṅgehi parivāretvā hatthikkhandhe nisīditvā rājānaṃ majjhe katvā vāmadakkhiṇapassato namassamānā nikkhamiṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:429_30: Tassa pana gamanaṃ ajātasattuno tathāgatassa dassanatthāya jīvakambavanagamanaṃ viya tiṃsayojanappamāṇaṃ
anya-e1205n0:429_31: erāvaṇahatthikkhandhaṃ āruhitvā dvīsu devalokesu devehi parivāretvā sakkassa devānamindassa nandanavanagamanakālo
anya-e1205n0:429_33: So vaḍḍhamāsakacchāyāya sampattāya somanagarato nikkhamitvā serudahassa ante nānāvidha alaṅkatapaṭiyattanāṭakitthīnaṃ
anya-e1205n0:430_0: Mahāpathavī bhijjamānā viya pabbatā parivattamānā viya mahāsamuddo (thalaṃ) avattharitvā bhijjamānakālo viya ca ahosi.
anya-e1205n0:430_4: Tato rājā bahū gandhadīpadhūpādayo gāhāpetvā uṭṭhāya senāya parivuto therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ vanditvā nisinno āha?
anya-e1205n0:430_5: Ayya rājāno ca sampiṇḍitvā dakkhiṇodakassa dīyamānassa kālo’ti.
anya-e1205n0:430_6: Thero tassa kathaṃ sutvā bhaddakaṃ mahārājā’ti sampaṭicchi.
anya-e1205n0:430_7: Tasmiṃ dakkhiṇodakassa dānadivase nānāvidhavicittamaṇidaṇḍakesu nānāvidha dhajapatākādīni bandhāpetvā samussitāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:430_10: Vipphuritakiraṇarajadhūmarāhuabbhādīhi uparodhehi virahito tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando samujjalarajatamayaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya pācīnadisato samuggato.
anya-e1205n0:430_12: Mahāmaṅgalacetiyaṃ pana jātisumanamālādāmena parikkhipitvā ekamālāguṇaṃ viya alaṅkari.
anya-e1205n0:430_13: Yathā tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando tathā padīpamālālaṅkato mahācetiyo ativiya virocati.
anya-e1205n0:430_14: Sakala laṅkādīpe pana sabbe rukkhāpi vicittadhajena alaṅkatā viya akālaphalapallavehi vicittā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:436_0: Sakalampi idaṃ dīpaṃ āsi obhāsitaṃ tadā.
anya-e1205n0:443_0: Sacetanā yathā sabbe akā pūjaṃ akā tadā;
anya-e1205n0:444_0: Tathā acetanā sabbe akā pūjaṃ anappakaṃ.
anya-e1205n0:445_0: Yebhuyyena bhumaṭṭhe deve upādāya yāva akaṇiṭṭhakā devā brahmā dibbamālāpāricchattakakoviḷāracandanacuṇṇaṃ
anya-e1205n0:445_1: gahetvā āgatādevāti vā manussāti vā jānituṃ asakkonti.
anya-e1205n0:445_4: Taṃ disvā rājā ativiya somanassappatto there ca avasesa mahāmattādayo sannipātetvā nāṭakādayo ca gahetvā,
anya-e1205n0:445_6: Theropi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe alaṅkatamaṇḍape nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:445_7: Rājā vāsitagandhodakasuvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā udakaṃ therassa hatthe āsiñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:445_9: ayyā esā dhātu mayhaṃ pitāmahavaṃsena āgatā.
anya-e1205n0:445_10: Idāni amhākaṃ atiruciraramaṇiyā rohaṇajanapadā āharitvā suvaṇṇena dhātugabbhaṃ,
anya-e1205n0:445_11: sattaratanena dhātumaṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā tasmiṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ buddhapaṭimaṃ nisīdāpetvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa
anya-e1205n0:445_12: nalāṭadhātuṃ nidahitvā ayyassa cīvarādīnamatthāya idāni soḷasagāmavarāni dassāmi’ti gāmavarāni datvā
anya-e1205n0:445_13: samantato tigāvutappamāṇe serudahe bheriṃ carāpetvā ārāmikaṃ katvā āha? Bhante,
anya-e1205n0:445_15: Gantvā ca pana ajjeva pariggahaṃ karothāti vatvā tattheva vāsupagato puna divase samāgantvā sattāhaṃ
anya-e1205n0:445_16: mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase mahābhikkhusaṅghassa tīcīvarappahonakasāṭakaṃ paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ datvā therassa
anya-e1205n0:445_18: ayya vihāre kattabbaṃ aparihāpetvā mayā kataṃ,
anya-e1205n0:445_20: Thero tassa kathaṃ sutvā sādhu mahārājāti sampaṭicchi.
anya-e1205n0:446_0: So pana cetiyassa pūjanatthāya pupphārāmaṃ kārāpetvā mālākārānaṃ paribbayaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:446_1: Tathā bherivādakanāṭakānampi vihārasīmante suvaṇṇanaṅgalena paricchinditvā ārāmikānampi gāmaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:446_2: Bhikkhusaṅghassa veyyāvaccatthāya attano santike pañcasataamaccadhītaro tattake amaccaputte dāsadāsiyo
anya-e1205n0:446_3: ca datvā paribbayatthāya tesaṃ tesaṃ pañcasatasahassakahāpaṇe ca dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:446_4: Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca dhātupujanatthāya soḷasasahassaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1205n0:447_2: Amhākaṃ vihāre ca ārāmikesu ca ayyesu ca appamatto hohīti ovaditvā sabbaṃ tassa niyyādesi.
anya-e1205n0:447_6: Mahārāja akittitena nimittena sīmaṃ bandhituṃ nasakkā,
anya-e1205n0:447_7: vihārassa pācīna pacchimuttaradakkhiṇato mahāsīmaṃ bandhanāya nimittaṃ sallakkhetvā dehi,
anya-e1205n0:447_9: Rājā tuṭṭho satta amacce sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā sīmānimittaṃ kittetvā āgamanatthaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1205n0:447_10: Te pana satta amaccā catusu disāsu nimittaṃ sallakkhetvā paṇṇe likhitvā āharitvā rañño adaṃsu.
anya-e1205n0:447_11: Rājā ekekaṃ satakahāpaṇaṃ datvā catusu disāsu ārakkhaṃ dāpetvā sīmaṃ bandhantūti mahābhikkhusaṅghassa nivedesi.
anya-e1205n0:447_12: Atha thero bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cetiyaṅgaṇe nisīditvā vappamāsakāḷapakkhadvādasadivase sīmaṃ bandhitvā niṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:448_2: Tato macchaselagāmassa vāma passena koṭasīmā nāma gāmakkhettaṃ vissajjetvā gaṇadvāragāmaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_3: Cittavāpiyā uttaravāna koṭito varagāmakkhette piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_4: Tato sālikaṃ nāma madhukarukkhe ṭhītapāsāṇathūpassa gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_5: Tato vuttika nāma vāpiyā dakkhiṇavāna koṭito kaṇikāra selassa gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_7: Tato kukkuṭasiva nāma upāsakassa madhukarukkhe ṭhītaṃ thūpaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_11: Tato sobbha majjhimena gantvā assabandhanaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_12: Tato pāsāṇassa matthake udaka kākaṃ nāma nigrodhaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_13: So rukkho udaka kākānaṃ vusita bhāvena evaṃ nāma jāto.
anya-e1205n0:448_14: Tato tambatitthaṃ nāma gantā mahācārikassanāma thūpamaggassa gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_16: Tato mahā kadamba passe ṭhītaṃ pāsāṇathūpaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_17: Tato mahā rājuvāpiyā uttarakoṭiyā ṭhītaṃ mahānigrodharukkhaṃ gato.
anya-e1205n0:448_21: Imaṃ ettakaṃ padesaṃ samantato paricchindāpetvā rājā adāsi.
anya-e1205n0:448_22: Vihārassa bahū ārāmike ca (tesaṃ) vividhāni upakaraṇāni (ca) dāpetvā sabbe pākāratoraṇādayo kārāpetvā vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpetvā rohaṇameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:455_0: Thero pana tattheva viharanto yo imasmiṃ vihāre vasanto tathāgatassa ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vuttho viya bhavissatīti
anya-e1205n0:455_2: parivāretvā sabba buddhaguṇaṃ anussaranto ciraṃ vasitvā tattheva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e1205n0:464_0: Sattānaṃ uttamaṃ santiṃ katvā ca janasaṅgahaṃ;
anya-e1205n0:469_13: tassa pana ekanāmaṃ katvā kārāpite mahāgāme tissamahāvihārādiṃ katvā ekasataaṭṭhavīsavihārāni katāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e1205n0:472_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rājā mahādānaṃ datvā puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatti.
anya-e1205n0:474_0: Atthaṃ janassa katvāna gantvāna tusitaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e1205n0:475_0: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ cīraṃ bhuñjiya nandito;
anya-e1205n0:479_0: So tato cuto jambudīpe nibbattitvā metteyya bhagavato pitā subrahmā nāma bhavissati.
anya-e1205n0:479_1: Vihāradevī tasseva mātā brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī bhavissati.
anya-e1205n0:479_2: Abhayagāmaṇīkumāro tasseva metteyyassa bhagavato paṭhamaggasāvako bhavissati.
